description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Maybelline Eraser Dark Circles Concealer 110 - Fair**, the ultimate solution for concealing imperfections and evening out skin tone. Its innovative formula works to treat and hide dark circles, signs of fatigue, and even dark spots and fine lines. Thanks to its micro-corrector applicator, **Maybelline Eraser Dark Circles Concealer 110 - Fair** ensures easy application to define your facial features, highlight cheekbones, and correct any redness or signs of tiredness. Whether you're looking for under-eye brightness, professional contouring, or full coverage for imperfections, this multi-use concealer is your best choice.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Eraser Dark Circles Concealer 110 - Fair**
â­ Step 1: Apply to the under-eye area to brighten and conceal dark circles.
â­ Step 2: Contour and highlight with concealer to shape and illuminate the face.
â­ Step 3: Cover imperfections such as dark spots, fine lines, wrinkles, blemishes, and acne scars.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Eraser Dark Circles Concealer 110 - Fair**
â­ Features an effective formula to treat and conceal dark circles.
â­ Provides buildable coverage to suit your needs.
â­ Contains ingredients to correct redness and signs of fatigue.

#Maybelline #Concealer #FaceMakeup #DarkCircles #FullCoverage #FlawlessSkin #SaudiMakeup #BrightSkin #FaceContour #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Achieve a flawless complexion with **Maybelline New York Master Prime Pore Minimizer**. This innovative primer is specifically designed to visibly reduce the appearance of enlarged pores and smooth skin texture, providing you with the perfect canvas for your makeup application. It visually blurs imperfections, preparing your skin for a smooth, seamless foundation layer that lasts all day.

â­ Effectively minimizes the appearance of enlarged pores.
â­ Creates a smooth, silky-smooth skin texture.
â­ Acts as an ideal makeup base, ensuring longer wear.
â­ Its water-soluble formula provides gentle skin hydration.
â­ Perfect for wearing alone or under foundation.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Master Prime Pore Minimizer**
â­ Apply to areas with enlarged pores or all over the face before foundation.
â­ Can be used alone for a smooth, even-toned complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Master Prime Pore Minimizer**
â­ Advanced formula that purifies and refines skin texture.
â­ Active ingredients to enhance makeup longevity.

description_en:
Discover your perfect shade with **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink 175 Ringlead**. This liquid lipstick delivers a stunning, long-lasting matte finish in a range of super-pigmented shades to suit every occasion and look. Enjoy gorgeous, matte lip color that lasts up to 16 hours, with waterproof wear that ensures your color stays put, no matter what.

â­ Up to 16-hour matte finish.
â­ Waterproof formula.
â­ Unique arrow applicator for precise application.
â­ Available in a range of rich, saturated shades.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink 175 Ringlead**:
1. Choose your shade.
2. Trace your cupidâ€™s bow with the applicator for precise definition.
3. Mirror this application on the other half of the top lip, shading in evenly. Apply to the bottom lip.
4. Let it sit for a few minutes to dry matte for a flawless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink 175 Ringlead**:
Formulated with ingredients to provide rich color, long wear, and a matte finish, featuring a blend of oils and polymers for comfortable wear.

description_en:
Achieve a flawless, radiant complexion with **Maybelline New York Master Prime Primer 20 Illuminating**. This versatile primer is your ultimate solution for all your skin concerns, acting as a superior moisturizer and leaving your skin with a smooth, silky texture. Prepare your skin for professional makeup application that lasts, with a touch of natural radiance. **Maybelline New York Master Prime Primer 20 Illuminating** works to smooth skin's surface, minimize the appearance of pores, and enhance makeup's finish for a revitalized look all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Master Prime Primer 20 Illuminating**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to the entire face before foundation application.
â­ Can be worn alone for a naturally luminous effect.
â­ Leaves skin smooth and makeup-ready.
â­ Refines skin's appearance and helps lock makeup for extended wear.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Master Prime Primer 20 Illuminating**:
â­ Advanced formula that refines skin texture.
â­ Active ingredients that purify the skin's appearance.
â­ Water-soluble base for ultimate comfort.
â­ Targets specific skin concerns for improved overall look.
â­ Provides deep hydration without a greasy feel.

Winner of the Best Classic Red Lipstick Shade of 2020 in the Allure Best of Beauty Awards, this lipstick is specially crafted to complement all skin tones, featuring meticulously selected and tested pigments on 50 diverse skin tones.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Color Sensational Made For All Lipstick - Mauve 373**:

â­ High-performance pigments.

â­ Satin and matte formula.

description_en:
Discover flawless skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 120 - Beige 18ml**. This innovative foundation is expertly formulated for normal to oily skin, delivering perfect coverage and a natural matte finish. Its micro-blurring powders refine pores and absorb shine, leaving you with a unified, radiant complexion. The convenient 18ml packaging makes it your ideal travel companion for touch-ups on the go, ensuring you always have a beautiful finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 120 - Beige 18ml**:
â­ Apply an adequate amount to your skin after using primer.
â­ Gently blend for even distribution across the entire face.
â­ Enjoy unified skin, free from shine and visible pores.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 120 - Beige 18ml**:
â­ Lightweight formula for long-lasting comfort.
â­ Micro-blurring powders to reduce shine and minimize pores.
â­ Selected ingredients suitable for normal and oily skin.
â­ A natural, attractive matte finish.

#Maybelline #FitMe #Foundation #Makeup #OilySkin #NormalSkin #FullCoverage #MatteFinish #SaudiMakeup #Beauty

Discover **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation - Bronze**, your go-to for flawless, shine-free skin. 

**Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation - Bronze** is designed for normal to oily skin. Its innovative blurring micro-powders refine pores and absorb excess shine for a natural matte finish. Achieve poreless-looking skin with a seamless texture that perfectly matches your skin tone. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation - Bronze**:
â­ Apply to your skin after primer to even out your complexion for a natural, poreless look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation - Bronze**:
â­ Blurring micro-powders to refine pores.
â­ Shine-absorbing ingredients for a matte finish.
â­ Formula that fits your skin and texture for a natural look.

description_en:
Introducing the **Maybelline New York Lasting Fix** Translucent Loose Setting Powder, your secret weapon for makeup that lasts. This translucent loose powder locks in your makeup, extending its wear and perfecting your look. Achieve ultimate staying power with its blurring and smoothing properties, while effectively mattifying and minimizing shine for a flawless, long-lasting finish. This multi-tasking powder is also your go-to for achieving the coveted baked and veiled makeup techniques.

â­ Delivers serious staying power for all-day makeup wear.
â­ Blurs and smooths skin for a perfected complexion.
â­ Mattifies and minimizes shine for a flawless finish.
â­ Creates a seamless, airbrushed look.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Lasting Fix**: Lightly swirl a powder brush over the product and gently sweep across the face. Can be used alone or over makeup.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Lasting Fix**: Formulated with high-quality ingredients to ensure makeup longevity and skin perfecting.

description_en:
Experience irresistible color and creamy matte finish with **Maybelline New York Color Sensational Matte Lipstick 986 Melted Chocolate**. This lipstick delivers a bold, velvety touch for a captivating and fuller pout. Its unique formula ensures full coverage and rich, long-lasting color, while providing comfortable hydration throughout the day. The warm, sensational matte shades are designed to complement every skin tone, enhancing your natural beauty with an elegant touch.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Color Sensational Matte Lipstick 986 Melted Chocolate**
â­ Apply the lipstick to your upper lip, starting from the cupid's bow and following the lip line.
â­ Fill in the lips completely with color.
â­ Repeat on the lower lip for even coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Color Sensational Matte Lipstick 986 Melted Chocolate**
â­ Candelilla Wax: Provides shine and smoothness.
â­ Beeswax: Offers hydration and protection.
â­ Shea Butter: For deep hydration and nourishment.
â­ Botanical Oils: To enhance glide and comfort.

#Maybelline #MaybellineNY #MatteLipstick #SaudiMakeup #JeddahMakeup #Lipstick #VelvetLips #Chocolate #KSAFashion #Beauty

description_en:
Turn back time with **Maybelline New York Instant Age Rewind** Concealer, your ultimate solution for flawless skin and enhanced features.

This multi-use concealer is more than just a cover-up; it's your secret weapon to correct, shape, and illuminate. **Maybelline New York Instant Age Rewind** excels at concealing under-eye dark circles, signs of fatigue, and redness, while also being perfect for contouring cheekbones and highlighting facial features with a professional touch.

â­ Provides full coverage to hide dark circles and imperfections.
â­ Corrects the appearance of redness and fatigue for a natural radiance.
â­ Ideal for defining cheekbones and highlighting facial features.
â­ Features a micro-corrector applicator for easy and precise application.
â­ Portable design for on-the-go touch-ups.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Instant Age Rewind**:
â­ Step 1: Apply to the under-eye area to brighten and conceal dark circles.
â­ Step 2: Use to contour cheekbones and highlight the face.
â­ Step 3: Cover other imperfections like dark spots, fine lines, wrinkles, and blemishes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Instant Age Rewind**:
â­ Contains an innovative formula for perfect coverage.
â­ Protected by an anti-microbial system for applicator hygiene.

#MaybellineNY #Concealer #DarkCircles #UndereyeConcealer #Makeup #Beauty #Contour #Highlight #FlawlessSkin #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Achieve dramatically bold lashes with **Maybelline Go Extreme Mascara - Black**, designed to give you exceptional volume and intense, leather-black pigment. Experience unparalleled impact with its unique formula that amplifies your lash volume.

Features:
â­ Lumi-black pigments deliver 100% black intensity.
â­ The patented double-charged brush creates bigger, badder, bolder lashes.
â­ The double pump wand adds extra volume to the big brush.
â­ Contains 20x more collagen for stronger, fuller lashes.
â­ The mascara delivers 16x bolder looking lashes.
â­ Provides 100% leather black intensity for a dramatic eye look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Go Extreme Mascara - Black**:
â­ When applying, wiggle the brush at the root of the lashes to distribute the product evenly.
â­ For a bigger, badder, bolder look, use the mascara with the NEW Master Graphic Marker for bold, sharp lines.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Go Extreme Mascara - Black**:
â­ Collagen-rich formula to boost lash volume and strength.
â­ High-concentration black pigments for deep, intense color.
â­ Ingredients that give lashes a full, bold appearance.

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Maybelline Eraser Dark Circles Concealer**. This multi-use concealer corrects and conceals all imperfections in one go. It's the ultimate solution for covering dark circles and signs of fatigue under the eyes, and can also be used to contour and highlight your natural features. With its micro-corrector applicator, **Maybelline Eraser Dark Circles Concealer** ensures effortless application and professional results.

Product Features:
â­ Corrects and conceals dark circles and blemishes.
â­ Shapes cheekbones and accentuates features.
â­ Instantly corrects the appearance of redness and fatigue.
â­ Precision applicator for easy application.
â­ Multi-use formula: erases, shapes, and corrects.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Eraser Dark Circles Concealer**
â­ Step 1: Apply to the under-eye area to brighten and conceal dark circles.
â­ Step 2: Contour and highlight areas of the face for definition and illumination.
â­ Step 3: Cover dark spots, fine lines, wrinkles, and blemishes for a flawless complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Eraser Dark Circles Concealer**
â­ Protected by an anti-microbial system.
â­ Wipe off excess eye concealer with a dry tissue.

#Maybelline #Concealer #EyeMakeup #FullCoverage #DarkCircles #FaceMakeup #Contour #Highlight #FlawlessSkin #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Maybelline New York Eraser Dark Circles Concealer**, the multi-use concealer that erases, shapes, and corrects all your skin imperfections. This concealer is your ultimate solution for covering dark circles and signs of fatigue under the eyes, giving you a refreshed and radiant look. It's not just for under-eye coverage; you can also use it to contour and highlight your facial features like a pro.

â­ Features:
â­ Innovative applicator for precise and easy application.
â­ Effectively erases dark circles and hides signs of tiredness.
â­ Helps contour cheekbones and define facial features.
â­ Corrects redness and dark spots for a uniform complexion.
â­ Lightweight formula for a natural, long-lasting finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Eraser Dark Circles Concealer**:
â­ Step 1: Apply to the under-eye area to brighten and conceal dark circles.
â­ Step 2: Use it to contour and highlight areas of the face to shape and illuminate.
â­ Step 3: Cover imperfections such as dark spots, fine lines, wrinkles, and blemishes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Eraser Dark Circles Concealer**:
â­ Contains a unique formula for perfect, non-caking coverage.
â­ Enriched with moisturizing agents to maintain skin freshness.
â­ Protected by an anti-microbial system, so do not wet the applicator.
â­ Wipe off excess eye concealer with a dry tissue.

Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 332 - Beige**. Specifically designed to suit your skin, it provides a natural, poreless-looking finish.

This foundation features blurring micro-powders that refine pores while absorbing excess shine, giving your skin a natural matte finish that lasts. It offers perfect coverage that visibly minimizes pores and seamlessly evens out skin tone.

â­ 100% Matte Finish
â­ Blurs Pores

â­ Absorbs Shine

â­ Apply to clean skin after primer for a unified complexion and optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 332 - Beige**
â­ Blurring micro-powders to reduce pore appearance
â­ Oil-absorbing ingredients for shine control
â­ Lightweight formula for natural coverage

description_en:
Discover your perfect shade with **Maybelline Color Sensational Made For All Lipstick - Ruby For Me 385**, the classic red lipstick shade honored as Best of 2020 in the Allure Best of Beauty Awards. This revolutionary lipstick is crafted with specially selected and obsessively tested pigments, ensuring a sensational look on every complexion. 

â­ Dubbed Best Classic Red Lipstick Shade of 2020 in the Allure Best of Beauty Awards.
â­ Features specially selected and obsessively tested pigments for a sensational look on all skin tones.
â­ Trusted satin and matte formulas with honey nectar for a smooth and comfortable feel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Color Sensational Made For All Lipstick - Ruby For Me 385**
â­ Apply lipstick directly to your lips.
â­ For a more defined look, use a lip liner in a similar shade before application.
â­ For a matte finish, blot your lips with a tissue after the first application.

description_en:
Experience the ultimate in long-lasting lip color with **Maybelline New York Superstay Matte Ink** Liquid Lipstick. Achieve a bold, flawless matte finish that stays put for up to 16 hours, no matter what your day holds. Its waterproof formula ensures your lips look perfect through every sip, bite, and kiss.

â­ Enjoy an intensely pigmented, flawless matte finish that lasts up to 16 hours.
â­ Features a unique arrow applicator for ultra-precise application and defined lips.
â­ Available in a range of super saturated shades to suit every mood and occasion.
â­ Lightweight and comfortable formula for all-day wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Superstay Matte Ink**:
1. Choose your perfect shade for the ultimate matte pout.
2. Precisely trace your cupid's bow and lip contours with the applicator tip.
3. Apply evenly to the upper and lower lips, ensuring sharp application along the lip edge for a clean finish.
4. Allow the liquid lipstick to dry for a few minutes to achieve a perfect matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Superstay Matte Ink**:
â­ High-concentration pigment particles.
â­ Quick-drying matte ingredients.
â­ Advanced formula for long-lasting wear and color.

#MaybellineNY #Lipstick #SaudiMakeup #MatteLips #SuperStay #KSABeauty #LiquidLipstick #Beauty #Cosmetics #SaudiBeauty

Experience ultimate sophistication with **Maybelline Color Sensational Nu 315 Rich Plum Each**. This lipstick delivers irresistible color, designed to power your pout with a creamy, matte finish that feels as good as it looks. Enjoy warmer, more sensational nudes that complement every skin tone, offering a naturally captivating and glamorous look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Color Sensational Nu 315 Rich Plum Each**:
â­ Begin by applying the lipstick from the center of your upper lip and glide outwards to the corners.
â­ Repeat the process on the lower lip for a flawless finish.
â­ For enhanced definition, use a matching lip liner before application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Color Sensational Nu 315 Rich Plum Each**:
â­ Creamy formula infused with moisturizing oils.
â­ High-impact pigments for vibrant color payoff.
â­ Long-lasting matte finish.

â­ Effortless application that glides smoothly onto the eyelid.
â­ Water-resistant for long-lasting wear.
â­ Provides ultra-intense color payoff for dramatic eye looks.
â­ Sharpenable for continuous use and perfect precision.

description_en:
Elevate your lashes with **Maybelline New York Total Temptation Mascara Waterproof**, achieving a look of soft, separated, and dense lashes. Get ready to be obsessed with your lash volume, as this luxurious mascara builds lashes for full, soft density with a natural finish. Enjoy more intense and captivating lashes with every application.

â­ Features a creamy, whipped formula for soft, separated, and dense lashes.
â­ Creates bold, buildable volume for your desired look.
â­ Designed to effectively coat and separate your lashes.
â­ Ophthalmologist tested for safety and reassurance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Total Temptation Mascara Waterproof**
Step 1: Sweep the brush from root to tip of lashes, ensuring maximum length.
Step 2: Repeat the sweeping motion, zigzagging to separate lashes and distribute product evenly.
Step 3: Apply additional coats as needed to build intense lash volume without clumping.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Total Temptation Mascara Waterproof**
â­ Creamy, whipped formula that nourishes lashes.
â­ Waterproof ingredients for long-lasting hold.
â­ Lash-separating agents for enhanced volume.
â­ Ophthalmologist tested.

#Maybelline #Mascara #Lashes #EyeMakeup #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah #SaudiMakeup #NYXCosmetics

Discover **Maybelline Superstay Foundation 26 Buff Nude**, a revolutionary formula that lasts up to 30 hours with high coverage and a matte finish that transforms your skin. Perfect for everyday wear for a flawless, smudge-proof look.

â­ Apply to skin after primer to even out skin tone.
â­ Blend with fingertips, sponge, or brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Superstay Foundation 26 Buff Nude**:

â­ Suitable for all skin types.

Achieve a flawless complexion with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 250 Sun Beige**. This foundation is formulated with blurring micro powders that refine pores and absorb shine, delivering a natural, matte finish. Designed for normal to oily skin, it blends seamlessly to create a poreless-looking complexion.

â­ 100% Matte finish.
â­ Blurs pores effectively.
â­ Fits your skin tone and texture.
â­ Absorbs excess shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 250 Sun Beige**:
â­ Apply to your skin after primer to even out your skin tone for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 250 Sun Beige**:
â­ Micro powders for shine absorption.
â­ Pore-refining ingredients.
â­ Skin-adapting formula.

description_en:
**Maybelline Eraser Dark Circles Neutralizer 150 - Neutral** is the ultimate concealer for all your needs! Discover the power of this multi-use concealer that corrects and conceals imperfections, giving you flawless, radiant skin.

It excels at treating and hiding dark circles and signs of fatigue under the eyes, and is also perfect for contouring and highlighting your facial features.

â­ Micro-corrector applicator ensures easy and precise application.
â­ Multi-use concealer that erases, shapes, and corrects.
â­ Effectively erases and conceals under-eye dark circles.
â­ Shapes cheekbones for a sculpted look.
â­ Corrects redness and reduces the appearance of facial fatigue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Eraser Dark Circles Neutralizer 150 - Neutral**
â­ Step 1: Apply to the under-eye area to brighten and conceal dark circles.
â­ Step 2: Contour and highlight with concealer to shape and illuminate the face.
â­ Step 3: Cover imperfections such as dark spots, fine lines, wrinkles, blemishes, and acne scars.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Eraser Dark Circles Neutralizer 150 - Neutral**
â­ Protected by an anti-microbial system, so do not wet the applicator.
â­ Wipe off excess eye concealer with a dry tissue.

#Maybelline #Concealer #DarkCircles #Beauty #FaceMakeup #ClearSkin #Skincare #Cosmetics #SaudiArabia #Riyadh

description_en:
Unleash fearless, fun color for up to 48 hours with **Maybelline Tattoo Liner Play Eyeliner Punch**. This dip-in liquid liner glides on bold, stays smudge-proof and waterproof, and comes off easy.

â­ Glides on bold and intense color that lasts up to 48 hours.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof power for a flawless look.
â­ Easy to apply with a precision felt tip.
â­ Comes off easily with warm water for quick replays and style changes.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Tattoo Liner Play Eyeliner Punch**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Trace your upper lash line with the precision felt tip applicator to define your eyes.
â­ For a winged eyeliner look, extend the line past the outer corner of the eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Tattoo Liner Play Eyeliner Punch**:
â­ Liquid formula for rich color payoff.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof ingredients.
â­ Gentle ingredients for easy removal.

#Maybelline #TattooLiner #Eyeliner #EyeMakeup #BoldEyes #Waterproof #SaudiBeauty #SaudiArabia #Jeddah #Riyadh

Discover bold color and a velvety matte finish with **Maybelline Color Sensational Matte Lipstick 975 Divine Wine**. This lipstick delivers irresistible color to power your pout, featuring the creamiest mattes for a comfortable, smooth feel. **Maybelline Color Sensational Matte Lipstick 975 Divine Wine** is crafted with warmer, more sensational nudes to complement every skin tone, making it your perfect choice for a complete look. 

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Color Sensational Matte Lipstick 975 Divine Wine**
â­ Apply the lipstick directly to your lips.
â­ For a more defined look, use a lip liner first.
â­ You can layer for increased color intensity.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Color Sensational Matte Lipstick 975 Divine Wine**
â­ Creamy matte formula.
â­ Rich color pigments.
â­ Moisturizing agents for lip nourishment.
â­ Silky smooth finish.

description_en:
Achieve an irresistible look with the **Maybelline Color Sensational Creamy Matte Lipstick - 970 Ruby**. This product delivers bold, matte color with a luxurious creamy formula, designed to enhance your lips with ultimate elegance. Enjoy the sensual warmth of colors that suit all skin tones, giving you a complete and radiant look that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Color Sensational Creamy Matte Lipstick - 970 Ruby**:
â­ Apply directly to your lips using the applicator.
â­ Start from the center of your lips and blend outwards towards the corners for precise application.
â­ For a more intense look, you can apply a second coat.
â­ Gently blend with your fingertips for a softer color distribution.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Color Sensational Creamy Matte Lipstick - 970 Ruby**:
â­ Creamy formula enriched with moisturizing ingredients.
â­ High-concentration pigments for vibrant color payoff.
â­ A non-shiny, attractive matte finish.
â­ Paraben-free.
â­ Vitamin E to help hydrate lips.

description_en:
Unleash your bold look with **Maybelline Lipstick Color Sensational 162 Feel Pink**. This lipstick offers a unique, long-lasting color experience with a creamy matte formula that gives your lips a luxurious finish. Discover warmer, more captivating nude shades that suit all skin tones, for a complete and distinctive appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lipstick Color Sensational 162 Feel Pink**:
â­ Start by defining your lips with a matching lip liner.
â­ Apply the lipstick directly to your lips.
â­ For a more defined look, use a lip brush.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lipstick Color Sensational 162 Feel Pink**:
â­ Ricinus Communis Seed Oil
â­ Octyldodecanol
â­ Candelilla Cera
â­ Mineral Oil
â­ Beeswax
â­ Olea Europaea Fruit Oil
â­ Microcrystalline Wax
â­ Cocos Nucifera Oil
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ Fragrance

description_en:
Unleash your creativity with **Maybelline Tattoo Liner Play** Liquid Eyeliner, delivering fearless, intense color for up to 48 hours. This innovative dip-in liquid liner glides on smoothly to create bold, mesmerizing looks that last, while being surprisingly easy to remove.

â­ Experience fearlessly bold, intense color that lasts up to 48 hours with **Maybelline Tattoo Liner Play**.
â­ Glides on smoothly for effortless application and comes off easily.
â­ Enjoy smudge-proof and waterproof power for all-day wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Tattoo Liner Play**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Trace your upper lash line with the precision felt tip applicator to define your eyes.
â­ For a winged eyeliner look, extend the line past the outer corner of the eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Tattoo Liner Play**:
â­ High-pigment liquid formula.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof ingredients.
â­ Color-fixing agents.

description_en:
Discover flawless radiance with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 312 - Beige**. This foundation offers light to medium coverage with a natural, long-lasting matte finish. Its blurring micro-powders refine pores and absorb excess shine, leaving your skin looking smooth and imperfection-free. It's ideal for normal to oily skin, adapting to your skin's texture for a natural, poreless-looking complexion. Achieve 100% matte skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 312 - Beige**.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 312 - Beige**:
â­ Apply a small amount to your skin after using primer.
â­ Blend evenly using your fingertips, a brush, or a sponge for a uniform coverage.
â­ Start from the center of your face and blend outwards.
â­ Build coverage as needed to achieve your desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation 312 - Beige**:
â­ Provides a natural matte finish.
â­ Helps blur pores and minimize their appearance.
â­ Absorbs excess oil and controls shine.
â­ Fits your skin tone and natural texture.
â­ Delivers a flawless and attractive complexion.

#Maybelline #FitMe #Foundation #Makeup #OOTD #MatteSkin #Skincare #FullCoverage #SaudiMakeup #KSA

description_en:
Ink your lips in up to 16 HR saturated liquid matte with **Maybelline New York Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - 35 Creator**. This iconic saturated liquid matte formula delivers a flawless, weightless wear and a perfect bold lip. The unique arrow applicator ensures precise application for a full-coverage, ultra-pigmented pout that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - 35 Creator**:
â­ Ensure lips are clean and dry before application.
â­ Use the precise arrow applicator to outline your lips.
â­ Fill in lips with one swipe of color for perfect coverage.
â­ Allow the lipstick to dry completely for a long-lasting matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - 35 Creator**:
â­ Isododecane
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Trimethylsiloxysilicate
â­ Polyisobutene
â­ Synthetic Fluorphlogopite
â­ Paraffinum Liquidum / Mineral Oil / Huile Minerale
â­ Disteardimonium Hectorite
â­ Butylene Carbonate
â­ Silica
â­ Silica Dimethyl Silylate
â­ Caprylyl Glycol
â­ Trihydroxystearin
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Parfum / Fragrance
â­ Linalool
â­ Geraniol
â­ Limonene
â­ Hydroxycitronellal
â­ Citronellol
â­ Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone
â­ Benzyl Alcohol
â­ [+/- May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), D&C Red No. 7 (CI 15850), D&C Red No. 28 Lake (CI 45410), FD&C Yellow No. 5 Lake (CI 19140), FD&C Blue No. 1 Lake (CI 42090), Carmine (CI 75470)]

description_en:
Experience bold, incredible volume with **Maybelline New York Colossal Big Shot Mascara - Very Black**. This mascara delivers 100% black lashes and massive volume thanks to its unique formula.

â­ 15x more volume in just 2 coats.
â­ Collagen-infused formula for strong, healthy lashes.
â­ Iconic Mega Brush for easy and precise application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Colossal Big Shot Mascara - Very Black**:
â­ Step 1: Sweep the Mega Brush from root-to-tip of lashes to create instant volume.
â­ Step 2: Try not to let the mascara dry in between coats for maximum impact.
â­ Step 3: Apply to upper lashes and sweep to remove any clumps.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Colossal Big Shot Mascara - Very Black**:
â­ Collagen-infused formula.
â­ Highly concentrated black pigments.
â­ High-quality ingredients for stunning lashes.

description_en:
Achieve flawless skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Liquid Foundation**, specially formulated for normal to oily skin. Its blurring micro-powders refine pores while absorbing excess shine for a natural, matte finish that lasts. **Maybelline Fit Me Liquid Foundation** glides on smoothly, perfectly fitting your skin and texture for a natural look and poreless-looking skin.

Product Features:
â­ 100% Matte finish.
â­ Blurs pores effectively.
â­ Fits your skin perfectly.
â­ Absorbs excess shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Liquid Foundation**
â­ Apply to clean skin or after using primer to even out your skin tone for a flawless finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Liquid Foundation**
â­ Contains blurring micro-powders that refine pores and absorb shine.
â­ Lightweight formula for natural coverage.

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined, fuller-looking brows that last with **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow Waterproof Black Brown 07**. This waterproof eyebrow gel offers ultra-resistant, long-lasting definition for a flawless brow look that endures.

Features:
â­ Fills and colors your eyebrows for a fuller, thicker appearance.
â­ Ultra-resistant and waterproof formula that ensures no transfer.
â­ Easy-to-use sculpting tip and spoolie brush for precise application.
â­ Smudge-proof and transfer-proof for all-day wear.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow Waterproof Black Brown 07**:
â­ Step 1: Use the sculpting tip to fill the mid-brow and tail, moving outwards.
â­ Step 2: Lightly fill in the inner brow.
â­ Step 3: Blend using the grooming spoolie.
â­ Step 4: Allow time to dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow Waterproof Black Brown 07**:
â­ Advanced gel formula for filling and shaping brows.
â­ High-quality pigments for enhanced color payoff.
â­ Fixing ingredients for guaranteed long-lasting, waterproof wear.

#Eyebrows #BrowTattoo #EyeMakeup #Maybelline #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #LongLastingMakeup #WaterproofBrows #ProMakeup #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Define your lip shape effortlessly with the creamy texture of **Maybelline Color Sensational Liner 20 Seduction- Nude**. Coordinate your lip look with matching Color SensationalÂ® Lip Colors or create bold definition by lining your lips in a darker shade. The **Maybelline Color Sensational Liner 20 Seduction- Nude** creates a perfectly defined lip look that helps lipstick stay put for your most impactful lip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Color Sensational Liner 20 Seduction- Nude**:
â­ Step 1: Start with clean, bare lips.
â­ Step 2: Outline outer lips and slightly over draw your natural lip line for a fuller lip look.
â­ Step 3: Contour inside lips by softly drawing lines and filling in the corners and center of lip curves.
â­ Step 4: Start from the center of your lips, then fill in with Color Sensational Lip Color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Color Sensational Liner 20 Seduction- Nude**:
â­ Rich creamy formula.
â­ Vibrant pigments.
â­ Long-lasting wear.
â­ Prevents lipstick bleeding.
â­ Perfect for definition and hydration.

description_en:
Unlock the ultimate eye drama with **Maybelline Lasting Drama Kohl Liner Black**. This is the new generation of liner, combining pencil's precision with cream's intensity for a bold, smoldering gaze. Its oil-free cream formula is infused with the highest concentration of pigments for intensely dramatic eyes that last up to 16 hours, smudge-proof and waterproof. **Maybelline Lasting Drama Kohl Liner Black** is safe for sensitive eyes and ophthalmologist-tested, plus contact lens safe.

â­ Delivers an intense, captivating effect to your eyes.
â­ Perfect for solo use or with other shades for a complete smoky look.
â­ Formulated with the highest concentration of pigments for an irresistibly intense look.
â­ Its creamy intensity ensures long-lasting comfort.
â­ Effortless application for easy and comfortable use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lasting Drama Kohl Liner Black**:
â­ Step 1: Start at the inner corner of the upper eye and extend beyond the top lash line.
â­ Step 2: Extend the lower line inward so the lines meet in the inner corner of the eye.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lasting Drama Kohl Liner Black**:
â­ Creamy formula with high pigment concentration.
â­ Oil-free.
â­ Smudge-proof and waterproof for 16 hours.
â­ Safe for sensitive eyes.

#Maybelline #KohlLiner #Eyeliner #EyeMakeup #Eyeshadow #Beauty #BlackEyes #DailyMakeup #OnlineShopping #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Unleash your fearless side with **Maybelline Tattoo Liner Play**! Experience bold, intense color that lasts up to 48 hours, with an easy-glide application and effortless removal. This waterproof and smudge-proof formula ensures your look stays flawless all day long.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Tattoo Liner Play**:
â­ Shake well before use for even color distribution.
â­ Trace your upper lash line with the precision felt tip applicator to define your eyes.
â­ For a winged eyeliner look, extend the line past the outer corner of your eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Tattoo Liner Play**:
â­ Rich, pigmented liquid formula for bold, intense coverage.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof for long-lasting wear.
â­ Easily removable with warm water for ultimate convenience.

title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† ØªØ§ØªÙˆ Ø§Ù„Ø­ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨ Ø¶Ø¯ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø§Ø¡ - Ø¨Ù†ÙŠ ØºØ§Ù…Ù‚ 06
description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined, fuller-looking brows that last for days with **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow Waterproof Deep Brown 06**. This innovative brow gel delivers rich color and unparalleled hold for a flawless brow look that stays put. Its unique waterproof and smudge-proof formula ensures you stay confident all day long.

Features:
â­ Fills and colors eyebrows with an ultra-resistant, waterproof formula.
â­ The sculpting tip and eyebrow spoolie brush work together to create fuller-looking eyebrows that last for days.
â­ Smudge-proof and does not transfer.
â­ 98% saw fuller and thicker eyebrows.
â­ 93% saw gel does not transfer.
â­ 88% would recommend to a friend.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow Waterproof Deep Brown 06**:
â­ Step 1: Use sculpting tip to fill mid-brow and tail moving outwards.
â­ Step 2: Lightly fill in inner brow.
â­ Step 3: Blend using grooming spoolie.
â­ Step 4: Allow time to dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow Waterproof Deep Brown 06**:
â­ Advanced formula for long-lasting brow definition.
â­ High-quality pigments for natural and attractive color.
â­ Waterproof and smudge-proof setting ingredients.

#Maybelline #TattooBrow #EyebrowGel #WaterproofMakeup #BrowGoals #NaturalBrows #Beauty #EyesMakeup #SaudiBeauty #MakeupAddict

description_en:
Experience unparalleled staying power with **Maybelline Superstay 30H Foundation**. This high-coverage, transfer-resistant, water-resistant, and sweat-resistant foundation delivers a flawless look that lasts up to 30 hours. It boasts a lightweight formula that provides your skin with a natural, matte finish, while correcting imperfections, evening out skin tone, and transforming its appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Superstay 30H Foundation**:
â­ Apply to your skin after primer to even out your skin tone.
â­ Blend with fingertip, sponge, or brush.
â­ Can be used with SuperStay powder for makeup setting.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Superstay 30H Foundation**:
â­ Transfer-resistant, water-resistant, and sweat-resistant formula.
â­ Oil-free formula that does not clog pores.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind**, your ultimate solution for concealing imperfections and contouring your features. This powerful concealer excels at erasing under-eye dark circles, correcting redness and fatigue, and beautifully highlighting cheekbones. Its unique formula is easy to apply thanks to the micro-corrector applicator, making it your perfect beauty companion. Whether you want to illuminate your face, define your contour, or cover dark spots, **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind** provides a natural, radiant finish that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind**:
â­ Step 1: Apply to the under-eye area to brighten and conceal dark circles.
â­ Step 2: Use to contour and highlight facial features.
â­ Step 3: Cover imperfections such as dark spots, fine lines, wrinkles, blemishes, and acne scars for a flawless complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Concealer Instant Age Rewind**:
â­ Micro-corrector applicator for effortless application.
â­ Multi-use formula for erasing, shaping, and correcting.
â­ Effective ingredients for concealing dark circles and fatigue.
â­ Provides instant radiance and defines cheekbones.

#Maybelline #Concealer #Makeup #FaceMakeup #EyeMakeup #FullCoverage #DarkCircles #RadiantSkin #SaudiMakeup #Beauty

description_en:
Achieve a flawless, long-lasting makeup look with **Maybelline Super Stay 24 Hour Photofix Foundation**. This foundation is designed to provide full coverage and a seamless finish, offering all-day comfort without any skin irritation. It comes in a distinguished shade that perfectly matches your skin tone, delivering lightweight, full coverage to correct imperfections and conceal visible marks. **Maybelline Super Stay 24 Hour Photofix Foundation** is suitable for all skin types and tones, featuring saturated color pigments for an ultra-transforming effect that stays put all day. Its lightweight yet high-impact formula glides onto the skin effortlessly, giving you a flawless makeup finish that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay 24 Hour Photofix Foundation**
â­ Apply to the face.
â­ Blend with fingertip, sponge, or Maybelline Blender for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay 24 Hour Photofix Foundation**
â­ Saturated color pigments for ultimate coverage.
â­ Lightweight formula for lasting comfort.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.
â­ Oil-free and non-comedogenic.
â­ Dermatologist tested.
#Maybelline #Foundation #Makeup #FullCoverage #LongLastingMakeup #SuperStay #MaybellineNewYork #FaceMakeup #SaudiMakeup #FlawlessSkin

description_en:
**Maybelline New York Master Prime 30 Anti-Redness** is your first step towards a flawless complexion. This innovative primer effectively color corrects and visually blurs redness, making it an essential base for your daily makeup routine. It blends seamlessly into the skin, providing a smooth and even canvas, ready for foundation and long-lasting makeup application. Whether you prefer a natural look or a full glam, this primer ensures radiant, blemish-free skin.

âœ¨ **Product Highlights:**
â­ Visually corrects color and reduces redness.
â­ Provides a smooth, even base for makeup application.
â­ Enhances makeup longevity for all-day wear.
â­ Lightweight formula, easy to blend into the skin.
â­ Improves skin's appearance and feel for a natural, radiant look.

ğŸ”¹ **Usage Instructions for Maybelline New York Master Prime 30 Anti-Redness**:
â­ Apply to clean, dry skin before foundation.
â­ Can be worn alone for a natural radiance and to even out skin tone.
â­ Distribute evenly all over the face, focusing on areas prone to redness.

ğŸ”¹ **Ingredients of Maybelline New York Master Prime 30 Anti-Redness**:
â­ Water-soluble base for ultimate comfort.
â­ Active ingredients that purify and refine skin's appearance.
â­ Specifically designed to target specific skin concerns like redness.
â­ Contributes to a smoother, more uniform skin texture.
â­ Formula helps keep makeup in place for long hours.

description_en:
Discover the ultimate precision with the **Maybelline Brow Ultra Slim** pencil. Achieve perfectly defined, natural-looking brows with its smooth formula that glides effortlessly without color streaks or pencil breakage. Create ultra-precise, hair-like strokes for the most defined and natural-looking eyebrows yet. This pencil features an ultra-slim 1.5mm precision tip, a break-resistant formula, and a built-in spoolie brush to shape and blend for beautifully sculpted brows.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Brow Ultra Slim**:
â­ Draw small, light strokes along the brow contour to mimic natural hairs.
â­ Use the integrated spoolie brush to groom brow hairs upwards and outwards for a polished finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Brow Ultra Slim**:
â­ Smooth, blendable formula.
â­ Ultra-slim 1.5mm tip for detailed application.
â­ Built-in spoolie brush for grooming and blending.
â­ Available in six shades to complement various skin tones.

#Maybelline #PerfectBrows #BrowDefinition #EyeMakeup #SaudiMakeup #Beauty #BrowUltraSlim #NaturalBrows #MaybellineNewYork #Cosmetics

description_en:
Achieve flawless, long-lasting perfection with **Maybelline New York Super Stay 24H Photofix Foundation**. This award-winning formula offers concentrated, 24-hour wear for a flawless finish that doesn't fade or shift. Its lightweight yet high-impact coverage glides onto the skin effortlessly, masking imperfections and providing a smooth, comfortable feel. Perfect for all skin types and tones, it's your secret to a radiant complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Super Stay 24H Photofix Foundation**:
â­ Apply to the face.
â­ Blend with fingertip, sponge, or Maybelline Blender for an even finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Super Stay 24H Photofix Foundation**:
â­ Lightweight formula.
â­ Saturated color pigments.
â­ Oil-free.
â­ Doesn't clog pores.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

title_en: Maybelline New York Super Stay 24H Long-Lasting Foundation Makeup - 10 Ivory

description_en:
Achieve flawless, perfect skin with **Maybelline New York Super Stay 24H Long-Lasting Foundation Makeup** in shade 10 Ivory. This foundation offers full coverage and lasts for up to 24 hours, giving you a consistent makeup look that stays put all day. Its lightweight and comfortable formula sits well on the skin, with rich pigments ensuring even color and a natural finish. Ideal for all skin types, it helps to conceal imperfections and unify skin tone, providing a professional look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Super Stay 24H Long-Lasting Foundation Makeup**
â­ Apply to clean, dry skin.
â­ Blend the foundation evenly across the face using your fingertips, a makeup sponge, or a foundation brush.
â­ Blend well for a smooth and natural finish.
â­ Build additional layers for higher coverage if needed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Super Stay 24H Long-Lasting Foundation Makeup**
â­ Water (Aqua)
â­ Cyclopentasiloxane
â­ Isododecane
â­ Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate
â­ Glycerin
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Butylene Glycol
â­ Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate
â­ Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone
â­ Hexyl Laurate
â­ Magnesium Sulfate
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer
â­ Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate
â­ Triethoxycaprylylsilane
â­ Acrylonitrile/Methyl Methacrylate/Vinylidene Chloride Copolymer
â­ Aluminum Hydroxide

title_en: Maybelline Master Drama Eyeliner Pen - Dark Brown
title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ø¢ÙŠ Ø³ØªÙˆØ¯ÙŠÙˆ Ù…Ø§Ø³ØªØ± Ø¯Ø±Ø§Ù…Ø§ ÙƒØ­Ù„ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ - Ø¯Ø§Ø±Ùƒ Ø¨Ø±Ø§ÙˆÙ†
description_en:
Achieve an irresistible eye drama with **Maybelline Master Drama Eyeliner Pen - Dark Brown**. This is the new generation of eyeliner, combining the precision of a pencil with the intensity of a cream. Formulated with the highest concentration of pigments for more intense and defined eye drama. Its oil-free cream formula provides rich, long-lasting color that is smudge-proof and waterproof for up to 16 hours. A single stroke delivers the most intense line for lasting drama. **Maybelline Master Drama Eyeliner Pen - Dark Brown** is safe for your sensitive eyes and ophthalmologist-tested, as well as safe for contact lens wearers.

â­ Perfect for giving your eyes an intense and bold effect.
â­ Can be used solo or with other shades to achieve an ultimate smoky look.
â­ Formulated with the highest concentration of pigments to give you an intense and captivating look.
â­ Features a creamy intensity that ensures comfort all day long.
â­ Guarantees effortless application and ease of use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Master Drama Eyeliner Pen - Dark Brown**
â­ Step 1: Start at the inner corner of the upper eye and extend beyond the top lash line.
â­ Step 2: Extend the lower line inward so the lines meet in the inner corner of the eye.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Master Drama Eyeliner Pen - Dark Brown**
â­ Creamy formula rich in pigments.
â­ Oil-free.
â­ Smudge-proof and waterproof.

description_en:
Experience irresistible color and power your pout with the **Maybelline New York Color Sensational Classics Lipstick Toasted Brown 755**. This lipstick delivers the creamiest mattes, offering a smooth, comfortable feel. Discover warmer, more sensational nudes designed to flatter every skin tone for a truly captivating look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Color Sensational Classics Lipstick Toasted Brown 755**
â­ Apply lipstick directly to your lips.
â­ For a more defined look, use a lip liner before application.
â­ For a perfect matte finish, apply one or two coats as desired.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Color Sensational Classics Lipstick Toasted Brown 755**
â­ Ricinus Communis Seed Oil / Castor Seed Oil
â­ Isopropyl Myristate
â­ Ethylhexyl Palmitate
â­ Diisopropyl Dimer Dilinoleate
â­ Candelilla Cera / Candelilla Wax
â­ Ozokerite

Unleash fearless, fun color with **Maybelline Tattoo Liner Play**! This dip-in liquid liner glides on bold, intense color that lasts up to 48 hours, and it's waterproof and smudge-proof for all-day confidence.

â­ Waterproof and smudge-resistant ingredients.

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless** foundation, expertly designed for normal to oily skin. Its innovative formula works to blur pores and absorb shine, delivering a natural, long-lasting matte finish. Now available in a convenient 18ml size at an affordable price, allowing you to carry it anywhere for on-the-go touch-ups and confident radiance. **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless** foundation provides you with a unified complexion, free from imperfections.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless**:
â­ Apply an appropriate amount to clean skin after using primer.
â­ Blend evenly across the entire face for perfect coverage and even skin tone.
â­ Can be applied with fingers, a brush, or a sponge.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless**:
â­ Lightweight, non-greasy formula.
â­ Micro-blurring powders to refine pore appearance.
â­ Oil-absorbing ingredients for a matte finish.
â­ Suitable for normal to oily skin.

#FitMe #Foundation #Maybelline #Makeup #SaudiMakeup #RiyadhBeauty #JeddahMakeup #FullCoverage #HealthySkin #BeautyProducts

Introducing the ultimate solution for flawless skin: **Maybelline New York Instant Age Rewind Concealer** in Sand. This versatile concealer is your secret weapon to erase, shape, and correct imperfections. It's the best concealer to effectively cover under-eye circles, signs of fatigue, and dark spots, giving you a refreshed and radiant look.

Discover flawless, natural coverage with **Maybelline Fit Me Concealer**. This innovative, oil-free concealer is designed to match all skin tones, effectively concealing redness and blemishes for a natural, even complexion. Achieve a radiant and perfectly uniform look with ease.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Concealer**:
â­ Apply the concealer under your eyes or on any areas requiring extra coverage.
â­ Gently blend the concealer using your fingertips, a brush, or a sponge for a seamless, natural finish.
â­ Enjoy a perfected complexion with a radiant final look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Concealer**:
â­ Oil-free formula for comfortable, long-lasting wear.
â­ High-quality ingredients for optimal coverage.
â­ Formulated to suit all skin types and tones.

title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ù…Ø§Ø³ÙƒØ§Ø±Ø§ ÙƒÙˆÙ„ÙˆØ³Ø§Ù„ Ø¬Ùˆ Ø§ÙƒØ³ØªØ±ÙŠÙ… - Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ | Ø±Ù…ÙˆØ´ Ø£Ø¬Ø±Ø£ ÙˆØ£ÙƒØ¨Ø±
description_en:
Discover bold, impactful lashes with **Maybelline Colossal Go Extreme**! This revolutionary mascara delivers unparalleled volume, giving you bigger, bolder lashes for a dramatic, eye-catching look. Achieve supercharged lashes with the double-curved applicator designed to deposit an extra shot of volume onto the supersized brush. Its innovative, no-clump formula ensures smooth, full-looking lashes from root to tip.

â­ Delivers up to 16x bolder lashes and enhanced volume for a striking effect.
â­ Infused with 20x more collagen to boost lash health and vitality.
â­ Inspired by London Fashion Week for a trendy, captivating appearance.
â­ Clump-free formula prevents sticking and provides even coverage.
â­ Dual-pump wand deposits extra formula onto the big brush for maximum volume.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Colossal Go Extreme**:
â­ Start by sweeping the brush from the root to the tip of your lashes, using a zig-zag motion to ensure full coverage.
â­ Gently pull the wand through to the lash tips to separate and lengthen.
â­ Apply additional coats as desired for increased volume and intensity.
â­ Use the tip of the brush to precisely define lower lashes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Colossal Go Extreme**:
â­ Collagen: For enhanced lash volume and thickness.
â­ Nourishing botanical extracts: To maintain lash health.
â­ Intense black pigments: For a rich, deep black color.
â­ Quick-drying agents: To prevent eye smudging.
â­ Moisturizing agents: To keep lashes soft.

#MaybellineKSA #ColossalMascara #VoluminousLashes #EyeMakeup #RiyadhMakeup #JeddahMakeup #EasternProvinceMakeup #BeautyProducts #LongLashes #BeautyUnleashed

description_en:
**Maybelline Super Stay 30H Foundation** redefines long-lasting wear, offering high coverage with a weightless feel that stays put for up to 30 hours. From busy workdays to evening events, this foundation ensures your look remains flawless. Its transfer-resistant, water-resistant, and sweat-resistant formula provides unwavering confidence throughout your day. It corrects, glides on smoothly, and transforms your skin's appearance, delivering a natural, matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay 30H Foundation**:
â­ Start by applying primer to prepare your skin.
â­ Apply an appropriate amount of **Maybelline Super Stay 30H Foundation** onto your skin.
â­ Blend the foundation using your fingertips, a sponge, or a brush for an even application.
â­ For extra setting, you can use SuperStay powder.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay 30H Foundation**:
â­ Lightweight formula that doesn't clog pores.
â­ Transfer-resistant, water-resistant, and sweat-resistant.
â­ Provides a natural, matte finish.
â­ Dermatologist tested.
â­ Suitable for all skin types.

#Maybelline #Foundation #SuperStay #SaudiMakeup #FullCoverage #FacePowder #LongLastingMakeup #FoundationGoals #FlawlessSkin #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Discover the universally flattering beauty with **Maybelline Lipstick** Color Sensational Made For All, shade Pink 376. Dubbed the Best Classic Red Lipstick Shade of 2020 in the Allure Best of Beauty Awards, this product is meticulously crafted with a unique formula designed to suit all skin tones. It features specially selected and obsessively tested pigments on 50 diverse skin tones to ensure a sensational look for everyone. **Maybelline Lipstick** Color Sensational Made For All offers our trusted satin and matte formulas infused with honey nectar for a smooth, comfortable feel that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Lipstick**:
â­ Begin by outlining your lips with a suitable lip liner.
â­ Apply **Maybelline Lipstick** Color Sensational Made For All directly to your lips for rich color and a captivating finish.
â­ For a more polished look, gently blot your lips with a tissue after the initial application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Lipstick**:
â­ Specially selected pigments for all skin tones.
â­ Smooth satin formula.
â­ Creamy matte formula.
â­ Honey nectar for lip hydration.
â­ High-quality ingredients for long-lasting color and easy application.

description_en:
Achieve perfectly defined lips with the **Maybelline New York Color Sensational Shaping Lip Liner 110 Rich Wine**. This creamy liner glides on effortlessly, allowing you to precisely outline and fill your lips. Coordinate your look with matching Color SensationalÂ® Lip Colors or create bold definition by lining your lips in a darker shade. The **Maybelline New York Color Sensational Shaping Lip Liner 110 Rich Wine** creates a fully defined lip look that helps lipstick stay put for your most impactful lip.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Color Sensational Shaping Lip Liner 110 Rich Wine**:
â­ Step 1: Start with clean, bare lips.
â­ Step 2: Outline outer lips, slightly overdrawing your natural lip line for a fuller lip look.
â­ Step 3: Contour inside lips by softly drawing lines and filling in the corners and center of lip curves.
â­ Step 4: Start from the center of your lips and fill in with your favorite Color Sensational Lip Color.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Color Sensational Shaping Lip Liner 110 Rich Wine**:
â­ Creamy, smooth formula.
â­ Rich pigments.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients.
â­ Vitamin E.
â­ Coconut oil.

title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ù…Ø­Ø¯Ø¯ Ø¯Ù‚ÙŠÙ‚ Ø³Ø§Ø¦Ù„ Ù…Ø·ÙØ£ - Ø£Ø³ÙˆØ¯ | Maybelline Master Precise Liquid Eyeliner Matte - Black
description_en:
Achieve an alluring look that turns heads with the **Maybelline Master Precise Matte** Liquid Eyeliner in Black. Featuring an ultra-thin 0.4mm tip, it delivers precise, even lines without any mess, ensuring long-lasting wear. Its innovative pigment color technology provides intense black color for a striking finish, making it perfect for all your eye makeup needs, from bold lines to classic cat-eye flicks.

â­ Delivers an appealing look that is bound to turn heads.
â­ Ultra-thin 0.4mm tip for incredibly precise lines.
â­ Smudge-proof liquid formula that lasts for an extended time.
â­ Innovative pigment color technology provides intense color for a striking finish.
â­ Easy to use for a professional result in one stroke.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Master Precise Matte**:
â­ Start with a clean, makeup-free eye area.
â­ Draw the line starting from the inner corner of the eye towards the outer corner.
â­ For a precise wing, use tape as a guide at the outer corner.
â­ Draw the line along the edge of the tape.
â­ Carefully remove the tape to reveal your perfect wing.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Master Precise Matte**:
â­ Aqua
â­ Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer
â­ Butylene Glycol
â­ Ethylhexylglycerin
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Carbon Black (CI 77499)

#Maybelline #Eyeliner #LiquidEyeliner #EyeMakeup #Beauty #MakeupGoals #SaudiBeauty #KSAFashion #Cosmetics #MakeupAddict

â­ Apply on your skin after primer to even out your skin tone, blur pores, and minimize shine.

description_en:
Achieve a radiant and healthy complexion with **Maybelline New York Master Prime Primer 40 - Anti-Dullness**. This primer acts as a fundamental hydrator, preparing your skin for smooth and long-lasting makeup application. Its unique formula moisturizes the skin's surface, making it smoother, and helps makeup stay put for extended periods, giving you a perfect, beautiful look.

â­ Preps skin for makeup application by visually blurring away specific skin concerns.
â­ Formulated with a water-soluble base for skin perfection.
â­ Active ingredients refine skin's look and feel for makeup that lasts all day.
â­ Targets a range of specific skin concerns.
â­ Wear this face primer alone or under foundation.
â­ Enhances facial appearance and features perfectly without leaving a greasy feel.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Master Prime Primer 40 - Anti-Dullness**
â­ Apply all over the face before foundation, or wear alone for a luminous effect.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Master Prime Primer 40 - Anti-Dullness**
â­ Water-soluble base with active ingredients that improve skin appearance.

description_en:
Achieve flawless perfection with **Maybelline Super Stay Foundation 24H**, a full-coverage liquid foundation that delivers up to 24 hours of wear for a flawless finish that doesn't fade or shift. Its comfortable, ultra-pigmented formula glides onto the skin for a weightless, full-coverage effect that perfects and conceals. Ideal for all skin types and tones.

**Long-Lasting:**
â­ **Maybelline Super Stay Foundation 24H** provides 24-hour wear, staying put without the need for touch-ups. It offers a seamless finish that remains unchanged throughout the day.

**High-Quality Design:**
â­ Crafted with saturated pigments, **Maybelline Super Stay Foundation 24H** delivers an ultra-transforming effect that lasts all day. Its lightweight, high-impact formula blends effortlessly onto the skin for a flawless makeup finish.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Super Stay Foundation 24H**:
â­ Apply to the face and blend with fingertip, sponge, or Maybelline Blender for a smooth, even application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Super Stay Foundation 24H**:
â­ Full Coverage Formula
â­ Lightweight
â­ Does not clog pores
â­ Dermatologist tested
â­ Oil-free

title_ar: Ù…Ø§ÙŠØ¨ÙŠÙ„ÙŠÙ† Ù†ÙŠÙˆÙŠÙˆØ±Ùƒ Ù…Ø§Ø³ÙƒØ§Ø±Ø§ Ù…Ø§Ø³ØªØ± Ø¨Ø±Ø§Ùˆ 05 Ø´ÙØ§Ù - Ù„ØªØ­Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ ÙˆÙ†Ø­Øª Ø§Ù„Ø­ÙˆØ§Ø¬Ø¨
description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect brows with Maybelline New York Master Brow Gel 05 Transparent.

Up Your Brow Game in Two Quick Strokes! Maybellineâ€™s first sculpting brow mascara with tinted gel mousse provides the look of fuller, sculpted brows with a natural and even finish, all in one easy step. Eyebrows are the focal point that frame your face. Full, sculpted, or natural-looking brows can do wonders: bring out your cheekbones, elongate your face, brighten your eyes, and a whole lot more. With Maybelline New York brow sculpting mascara, you can achieve it all in a few quick strokes. Itâ€™s as easy to apply as regular mascara and gives you color, texture, and all-day hold.

â­ Provides intense 24-hour leather intensity (Note: This seems to be a mistranslation from the original Arabic, likely intended to mean 'defined' or 'strong' hold. We will keep it as per the provided data, but flag it for review).
â­ Sculpts brows in one easy step.
â­ Features a gel mousse plus a precision ball brush.
â­ Formula glides on smoothly without creasing.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Master Brow Gel**:

**Shaping Your Brows:**
â­ Brows define your look. Starting with the perfect shape can work wonders.
â­ When it comes to accurately shaping your brows, this simple, three-point rule will never steer you wrong: Align the start of your brow to the outside of the nose. Align the arch of your brow to the outer edge of the pupil. Brows should always taper off at the outer corner of the eye.

**Sculpting Your Brows:**
â­ Thick, natural brows are easy to master with the right tool. Maybelline New York brow sculpting mascara gives you a bolder, more dramatic look in two quick steps.
â­ Apply the mascara using quick, short strokes from the tail of your brow toward your nose. Then, retrace those strokes in the opposite direction.

**Defining Your Arch:**
â­ An easy way to practice shaping is the instant brow lift. Use the mascara to fill in your brows and add definition to your arch with your favorite highlighter.
â­ Highlight just above the arch of your brow. Highlight just under the tail of your brow.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Master Brow Gel**:

â­ Tinted Gel Formula.
â­ Gel Mousse.
â­ Precision Applicator Brush.
â­ Brow defining and holding ingredients.

Introducing the new 18ml size of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless** Foundation, now more affordable and convenient for your on-the-go lifestyle. This foundation is expertly formulated for normal to oily skin, featuring blurring micro powders that refine pores and absorb shine, delivering a natural matte finish. **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless** foundation seamlessly blends with your skin, providing a poreless look and a smooth, matte complexion that lasts.

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Maybelline New York Eraser Dark Circles Concealer 120 - Fair**. This multi-use concealer is your ultimate solution for erasing dark circles, shaping your features, and correcting any imperfections for a radiant, blemish-free complexion.

â­ **Product Features:**
â­ Provides full coverage for dark circles and imperfections.
â­ Effectively brightens the under-eye area.
â­ Ideal for contouring and highlighting to accentuate facial features.
â­ Designed to reduce the appearance of redness and fatigue.
â­ Features a micro-corrector applicator for easy and precise application.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Eraser Dark Circles Concealer 120 - Fair**:
â­ **Step 1:** Apply to the under-eye area to brighten and conceal dark circles.
â­ **Step 2:** Use for contouring and highlighting to shape and illuminate the face.
â­ **Step 3:** Cover other imperfections such as dark spots, fine lines, wrinkles, blemishes, or acne scars.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Eraser Dark Circles Concealer 120 - Fair**:
â­ Unique formula that helps conceal imperfections and provides natural coverage.
â­ Contains moisturizing agents to maintain skin's freshness.
â­ Enhanced with an anti-microbial system for superior protection.
â­ (Please refer to product packaging for complete ingredients and details).

#Maybelline #Concealer #Makeup #DarkCircles #Beauty #SaudiArabia #Skincare #EyeMakeup #ColorCorrector #NaturalBeauty

description_en:
Discover the secret to flawless skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation - Gold**. Specifically designed for normal to oily skin, its blurring micro powders refine pores while shine is absorbed for a natural matte finish. **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation - Gold** fits both skin and texture for a natural finish and poreless-looking skin.

Product Features:
â­ 100% Matte finish
â­ Blurs pores effectively
â­ Fits your skin tone and texture
â­ Removes shine for a fresh look

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation - Gold**:
â­ Apply a small amount to clean skin or after primer.
â­ Blend evenly using your fingertips, a sponge, or a brush for a uniform coverage.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte & Poreless Foundation - Gold**:
â­ Water
â­ Cyclomethicone
â­ Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate
â­ Glycerin
â­ Polymethyl Methacrylate
â­ PEG-10 Dimethicone
â­ Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer
â­ Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate
â­ Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone
â­ Disteardimonium Hectorite
â­ Sodium Chloride
â­ Phenoxyethanol
â­ Disodium Phosphate
â­ Methylparaben
â­ Propylparaben
â­ Disodium EDTA
â­ Tocopheryl Acetate
â­ Citric Acid
â­ Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)
â­ Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)

description_en:
Discover the secret to perfect skin with **Maybelline Fit Me Concealer 16 Warm Nude**. This liquid concealer offers flawless, natural coverage and is designed to match all skin tones for a more even complexion. Its oil-free formula effectively conceals redness, flaws, and blemishes, leaving your skin with a natural and refreshed look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Concealer 16 Warm Nude**
â­ Apply a small amount of concealer under the eyes or on any areas with blemishes.
â­ Gently blend using fingertips, a brush, or a sponge until seamlessly integrated with the skin.
â­ Achieve the perfect final look for a uniform, blemish-free complexion.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Concealer 16 Warm Nude**
â­ Lightweight liquid formula for easy blending.
â­ Oil-free.
â­ Covers redness, flaws, and blemishes.
â­ Suitable for all skin tones.
â­ Provides natural coverage.

#Maybelline #Concealer #FitMe #Makeup #Beauty #PerfectSkin #UndereyeConcealer #FaceMakeup #MaybellineConcealer #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Experience the melted metallic finish of the **Maybelline Face Studio Master Chrome Metallic Highlighter 200 Diamond Glow**. This super luminous highlighting powder drenches skin in pearl pigments, leaving a reflective finish for brilliant, glowing skin. Sweep onto the high points of the face and blend for a seamless metallic glow; use alone for a strobing effect, or with contour for a more sculpted look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Face Studio Master Chrome Metallic Highlighter 200 Diamond Glow**:
â­ Step 1: Apply highlighter with brush or fingertips.
â­ Step 2: Sweep onto targeted areas, such as cheekbones, brow bones, and down the bridge of the nose.
â­ Step 3: Blend for a seamless metallic glow.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Face Studio Master Chrome Metallic Highlighter 200 Diamond Glow**:
â­ Reflective pearl pigments for a melted metallic finish.
â­ Ultra-fine pressed powder formula.
â­ Provides a seamless metallic glow.

#Maybelline #Highlighter #FaceMakeup #Contour #MetallicGlow #PearlPigments #SaudiMakeup #SaudiBeauty #RiyadhMakeup #DiamondGlowMakeup

description_en:
Achieve perfect, long-lasting eyebrows with **Maybelline Tattoo Studio Waterproof Eyebrow Gel**, the innovative eyebrow gel that provides complete definition and is waterproof for up to several days. Its unique formula fills and colors your eyebrows efficiently, while the precise sculpting tip and eyebrow spoolie brush work together to create fuller-looking eyebrows that last. It does not stain the skin or transfer, giving you complete confidence with smudge-proof, transfer-proof brows.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Tattoo Studio Waterproof Eyebrow Gel**:
â­ Step 1: Use the sculpting tip to fill the mid-brow and tail, moving outwards.
â­ Step 2: Lightly fill in the inner brow.
â­ Step 3: Blend using the grooming spoolie.
â­ Step 4: Allow time to dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Tattoo Studio Waterproof Eyebrow Gel**:
â­ Waterproof tint gel.
â­ Precision sculpting tip.
â­ Eyebrow grooming spoolie brush.

Achieve a flawless matte finish with **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 358**. Designed for normal to oily skin, its blurring micro-powders refine pores while absorbing shine for a natural matte look. **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 358** fits your skin and texture perfectly, giving you poreless-looking skin with a natural finish.  Experience the difference of a truly refined complexion.

â­ 100% Matte.
â­ Blurs Pores.
â­ Fits your skin and texture.
â­ Removes Shine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 358**
â­ Apply to your skin after primer to even out your skin tone for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Fit Me Matte + Poreless Foundation 358**
â­ Advanced formula that absorbs shine and blurs pores.
â­ Fine powders for pore refinement.

description_en:
**Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow Waterproof Warm Brown 03** is a waterproof eyebrow gel that delivers fuller-looking definition that lasts for days, making it an essential addition to your beauty routine.

Features:
â­ Fill and color your eyebrows with this ultra-resistant and waterproof eyebrow filler.
â­ The sculpting tip and eyebrow spoolie brush work together to create fuller-looking eyebrows that last for days.
â­ Smudge proof, Does not transfer.
â­ 98% saw fuller and thicker eyebrows, 93% saw gel does not transfer, and 88% would recommend to a friend.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow Waterproof Warm Brown 03**:
â­ Step 1: Use sculpting tip to fill mid-brow and tail moving outwards.
â­ Step 2: Lightly fill in inner brow.
â­ Step 3: Blend using grooming spoolie.
â­ Step 4: Allow time to dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Tattoo Brow Waterproof Warm Brown 03**:
â­ Long-lasting waterproof gel formula.
â­ Precision sculpting tip for effective filling.
â­ Grooming spoolie for perfect blending.
â­ Smudge-proof and transfer-resistant formula.

description_en:
Unleash your confidence with **Maybelline Color Sensational Lipstick 988 Brown Sugar**. This lipstick delivers an irresistible matte color to power your pout, offering the creamiest matte finish. Experience warmer, more sensational nudes that complement every skin tone, adding a touch of sophisticated charm to your look.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Color Sensational Lipstick 988 Brown Sugar**:
â­ Begin by lining your lips with a lip liner that matches your natural lip color or the lipstick shade.
â­ Apply **Maybelline Color Sensational Lipstick 988 Brown Sugar** directly to your lips for full coverage.
â­ For a more precise application, use a lip brush to deposit the color evenly.
â­ Blot any excess lipstick with a tissue for a long-lasting finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Color Sensational Lipstick 988 Brown Sugar**:
â­ Beeswax
â­ Jojoba Oil
â­ Vitamin E
â­ Natural Mineral Pigments
â­ Creamy Matte Formula

description_en:
Long-lasting liquid matte lipstick.

The **Maybelline New York Super Stay Matte Ink** liquid lipstick delivers a long-lasting, flawless matte finish in a range of super-pigmented shades, from understated nudes and classic reds to mauves and everyday peaches. The **Maybelline New York Super Stay Matte Ink** has a shade for every occasion, allowing you to ink your lips in gorgeous, matte lip color that lasts.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Super Stay Matte Ink**:

â­ Choose your perfect shade.
â­ Use the unique arrow applicator to precisely trace your cupid's bow.
â­ Apply evenly to the top lip, then to the bottom lip.
â­ Use the precision tip for sharp application along the lip contours.
â­ Allow to dry for a few minutes for a perfect matte finish.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Super Stay Matte Ink**:

â­ Features a 100% matte finish.
â­ Boasts up to 16-hour wear.
â­ Comes with a unique applicator for precise and easy application.
â­ Available in a variety of rich, saturated shades for every look.

#Maybelline #MatteLipstick #SuperStayMatteInk #SaudiMakeup #LiquidLipstick #KSABeauty #LongwearMakeup #MatteLips #MaybellineNY #RiyadhBeauty

description_en:
Experience the allure of **Maybelline Color Sensational Lipstick**, delivering irresistible color and a creamy, nourishing touch for your lips. Its unique formula provides ultimate hydration and comfort, with a sophisticated matte finish. Designed to be your go-to for every occasion, it bestows a bold and captivating look that lasts. Featuring warmer, more sensational nudes to complement every skin tone, it's the perfect addition to your daily beauty routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Color Sensational Lipstick**:
â­ Apply the lipstick starting from the center of your upper lip and follow the contours of your lips.
â­ Repeat on the lower lip.
â­ For a more defined look, use a lip liner in a matching shade before applying the lipstick.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Color Sensational Lipstick**:
â­ Shea Butter for deep hydration.
â­ Vitamin E for lip nourishment.
â­ Natural Oils to enhance radiance.
â­ Rich Pigments for vibrant color payoff.

description_en:
Achieve flawless brows with **Maybelline New York Brow Satin Duo 4 Dark Brown**. This innovative dual-ended pencil empowers you to create perfectly defined eyebrows with a professional touch. The precise pencil allows you to draw hair-like strokes, filling in sparse and thin eyebrows for a natural, captivating look. The powder end then colours and fills in any remaining gaps, giving you bolder, more defined brows as desired. It's incredibly easy to use, requiring no extra brushes or complicated tools.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Brow Satin Duo 4 Dark Brown**:
â­ Step 1: Define and set your eyebrows with the wax pencil using short, light strokes to mimic natural hairs.
â­ Step 2: Fill in with the powder along the natural brow contour to fill gaps and achieve your desired look.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Brow Satin Duo 4 Dark Brown**:
â­ Pencil: Provides precise definition and hair-like strokes.
â­ Powder: Offers rich filling and natural-looking color for your brows.
â­ Blendable formula that prevents clumping.

Achieve a flawless, long-lasting makeup look with **Maybelline New York Lasting Fix Spray**. This setting spray delivers a matte finish that locks your makeup in place for up to 16 hours, ensuring your foundation, powder, eyeshadow, and brows stay put without fading or melting.

â­ Keeps foundation, powder, eyeshadow, and brows in place.
â­ Provides maximum matte effect and controls shine.
â­ Lightweight formula lasts throughout the day.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Lasting Fix Spray**
Step 1. Shake the bottle well.
Step 2. Hold 8-10" away from the face and ensure your eyes are closed.
Step 3. Spray 4-6 times around your face for ultimate setting.

Achieve perfectly defined brows with the **Maybelline Eyestudio Brow Satin Eyebrow 05 Black Brown**. This dual-ended pencil is your secret weapon for creating natural-looking, beautifully shaped eyebrows. Use the pencil end to draw fine, hair-like strokes to fill sparse areas, then apply the built-in powder to color and fill in gaps for a bolder, more voluminous brow.

â­ Dual-ended eyebrow pencil for versatile application.
â­ Pencil end: Thin tip for drawing precise, hair-like strokes to fill sparse brows naturally.
â­ Powder end: Filling powder to color and fill gaps for a bolder brow look.
â­ Easy to use, no extra brushes or tools needed.
â­ Creates a polished and defined brow appearance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline Eyestudio Brow Satin Eyebrow 05 Black Brown**:
â­ Step 1. Define and set eyebrows with the defining wax pencil using short and light strokes.
â­ Step 2. Fill in with the powder along the natural brow contour.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline Eyestudio Brow Satin Eyebrow 05 Black Brown**:
â­ Features a wax pencil for brow definition.
â­ Includes a color-filling powder for added volume and definition.
â­ Formulated for easy blending and long-lasting wear.

description_en:
Achieve salon-perfect brows with the **Maybelline New York Brow Satin Duo 2 Medium Brown**. This innovative dual-ended eyebrow pencil is your ultimate tool for defining and enhancing your brows. Start by outlining your brows and drawing hair-like strokes with the pencil to fill sparse, thin eyebrows for a natural, fuller look. Then, use the filling powder to color and fill in gaps for a bolder, more defined brow. The **Maybelline New York Brow Satin Duo 2 Medium Brown** is designed for effortless application, requiring no extra brushes or tools, making it your go-to for flawless brows anytime, anywhere.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Maybelline New York Brow Satin Duo 2 Medium Brown**
â­ Step 1: Define and set your eyebrows with the defining wax pencil using short and light strokes.
â­ Step 2: Fill in with the powder along the natural brow contour to add depth and fullness.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Maybelline New York Brow Satin Duo 2 Medium Brown**
â­ Precision pencil for drawing natural hair-like strokes and filling sparse brows.
â­ Rich filling powder to color and fill gaps for a bolder eyebrow look.
â­ Blendable formula for a natural finish.
â­ Suitable for all eyebrow types.

#MaybellineBrows #MaybellineKSA #EyebrowPencil #BrowMakeup #EyebrowGoals #MaybellineNewYork #NaturalBrows #BrowPowder #EyeMakeup #BeautySaudi
