title_ar: Ù†Ø§ Ùˆ Ø²ÙŠØª Ø§Ù„Ø¬ÙˆØ¬ÙˆØ¨Ø§ Ø§Ù„Ù†Ù‚ÙŠ 100% â€“ 118 Ù…Ù„ â€“ ØªØ±Ø·ÙŠØ¨ Ø¹Ù…ÙŠÙ‚ Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© ÙˆØ§Ù„Ø´Ø¹Ø±
description_en:
Experience the ultimate hydration and nourishment with **NOW Jojoba Oil 100% Pure** 118ml. This premium, expeller-pressed and hexane-free oil is your go-to for achieving soft, supple skin and healthy, radiant hair. Renowned for its versatility, **NOW Jojoba Oil 100% Pure** is perfect for all skin and hair types, effectively moisturizing dry skin and revitalizing dull hair. Its rich composition of essential fatty acids and fatty alcohols leaves your skin glowing and your hair feeling silky smooth.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **NOW Jojoba Oil 100% Pure**:
â­ For Healthy Hair: Add one tablespoon of the oil to your favorite shampoo or hair conditioner. It can also be massaged into the scalp and hair as a pre-wash treatment.
â­ For Glowing Skin: Mix one teaspoon of the oil with your body wash or shower gel for intensely soft skin.
â­ For Relaxation and Massage: Use as a massage oil to soothe muscles and moisturize the body.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **NOW Jojoba Oil 100% Pure**:
â­ 100% Pure Jojoba Seed Oil (Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil).

#JojobaOil #SkinMoisture #HairCare #NOWFoods #NaturalOil #HealthySkin #ShinyHair #BodyCare #SaudiBeauty #Skincare

description_en:
Indulge your skin with **Now Shea Butter 100% Pure**. This luxurious moisturizer boasts a rich, decadent texture that is well absorbed to condition and moisturize every type of skin, especially dry or rough areas like elbows, knees, and feet. Derived from the tree nuts of the karite trees that grow in Western and Central Africa, this shea butter is a wonderful emollient perfect for daily use and can also be used as a scalp moisturizer. It is hexane-free, paraben-free, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and vegan, making it a pure choice for your skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Now Shea Butter 100% Pure**
â­ Gently apply as desired, paying close attention to dry or rough areas.
â­ Reapply as needed.
â­ Note: This product is naturally solid and color/texture will vary depending on temperature. It will melt when warmed above body temperature and become solid again when cool. This is natural and may affect appearance but will not harm quality. If solid, it can be softened by placing in a pan of hot water or microwaving in a separate microwave-safe container. When microwaving, do not place the original jar directly; scoop out the desired amount into a microwave-safe container.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Now Shea Butter 100% Pure**
â­ 100% Pure Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter (Tree Nut).

Indulge your skin with **Now 100% Pure Cocoa Butter**, a luxurious natural moisturizer designed for deep, whole-body hydration. Its pure, hexane-free formula makes it safe even for the most sensitive skin types. It's ideal for soothing dry skin and improving the appearance of blemishes. **Now 100% Pure Cocoa Butter** melts smoothly upon contact or with gentle warming, offering a unique application experience. NOW Solutions products are reliably tested for the highest quality and are never tested on animals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Now 100% Pure Cocoa Butter**
â­ To soften, scoop out and rub vigorously between clean hands until the desired texture is reached.
â­ Use as a daily moisturizer for your skin.
â­ Reapply to skin as needed for continued hydration.

â­ Theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter.

description_en:
Introducing **Novalac Genio Baby Milk (3) 800 gm**, specially formulated to support the healthy and comprehensive growth of your toddlers from 1 to 3 years of age. During this crucial stage, iron plays a vital role in enhancing physical activities and cognitive development, while calcium and vitamin D contribute to building strong and healthy bones, teeth, and muscles. **Novalac Genio Baby Milk (3) 800 gm** provides your child with everything they need for this important developmental phase.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Genio Baby Milk (3) 800 gm**:
â­ Always wash your hands before preparing the bottle.
â­ Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, nipple, and all used materials by boiling for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil fresh drinking water and let it cool down to a suitable temperature.
â­ Use only the measuring spoon enclosed in the tin and add the correct quantity of powder as per the feeding chart.
â­ Close the bottle, shake well until the powder is totally dissolved.
â­ Close the tin tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Genio Baby Milk (3) 800 gm**:
â­ Fortified with Iron for enhanced physical growth (25 times more than cow's milk).
â­ Enriched with Calcium and Vitamin D to support bone and teeth development.
â­ A balanced blend of essential proteins and carbohydrates.
â­ Sucrose-free with a delicious vanilla taste.
â­ Contains 24 vitamins and minerals for complete nutrition.

#BabyMilk #Novalac #Genio #BabyNutrition #ChildHealth #KidsGrowth #SaudiMoms #BabyEssentials #FormulaMilk #KidsVitamins

title_ar: Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ (2) - ØªØ±ÙƒÙŠØ¨Ø© Ù…ØªØ§Ø¨Ø¹Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ù…Ù† 6-12 Ø´Ù‡Ø±Ù‹Ø§ØŒ 800 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Novalac Baby Milk (2) is an adapted infant milk formula for infants from 6 to 12 months, providing complete and optimal growth for your baby when breastfeeding is insufficient. Novalac 2 is designed to closely match the nutritional profile of breast milk, ensuring your baby receives essential nutrients needed during this crucial stage.

â­ Appropriate protein content for growth.
â­ Ideal balance of carbohydrates and fats.
â­ Rich in essential fatty acids for developmental support.
â­ Comprehensive range of essential vitamins and minerals.
â­ Fortified with Iron and Taurine for enhanced brain development.
â­ Free from sucrose and gluten.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Novalac Baby Milk (2):
â­ Always wash your hands before preparing the feed.
â­ Sterilize all feeding utensils (bottle, nipple) by boiling for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil clean drinking water and let it cool down to approximately 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the bottle first.
â­ Add the specified quantity of **Novalac Baby Milk (2)** powder using the enclosed measuring spoon.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Check the temperature before feeding your baby.
â­ Do not keep leftovers and discard any remaining feed after one hour.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Novalac Baby Milk (2):
â­ Cow's milk (protein source).
â­ Vegetable oils (palm oil, soy oil, coconut oil).
â­ Lactose.
â­ Maltodextrin.
â­ Vitamins and minerals.
â­ Essential fatty acids.
â­ Iron, Taurine.

#Novalac #BabyMilk #InfantFormula #BabyNutrition #FollowOnMilk #6MonthsBaby #SaudiBabies #HealthyEating #BabyEssentials #Novalac2

description_en:
Discover **Novalac Allernova** Milk 400 gm, the specialized formula designed to meet the nutritional needs of newborns and infants suffering from allergies to cow's milk proteins. **Novalac Allernova** milk features extensively hydrolyzed (Casein) Cowâ€™s Milk Protein for improved digestibility and tolerance. It is an iron-fortified and thickened formula, providing optimal nutrition from birth up to 3 years of age. It can be used as the sole source of nutrition until 6 months, and thereafter, following your doctor's advice.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Allernova**:
â­ Always wash your hands before preparing the bottle.
â­ Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, nipple, and all materials by boiling for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil fresh water and let it cool down to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the feeding bottle first.
â­ Add the correct quantity of **Novalac Allernova** powder using the enclosed measuring spoon.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Let it cool to a lukewarm temperature (37Â°C) before feeding.
â­ Each feeding should be consumed within one hour maximum after preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Allernova**:
â­ Extensively Hydrolyzed (Casein) Cowâ€™s Milk Protein.
â­ Iron-fortified to meet nutritional requirements.
â­ Thickened and specially formulated for allergies.
â­ Suitable for use from birth up to 3 years.

title_en: Novalac Novabean Infant Formula for Constipation Relief 800g
title_ar: Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ø¨ÙŠÙ† Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ù„Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ø¬ Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ù…Ø³Ø§Ùƒ 800 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Novalac Novabean is a complete infant formula specifically designed to support your baby's optimal growth, meeting the specific nutritional requirements from birth to 12 months, especially when breastfeeding is not applied. This product is an ideal choice to assist with infant constipation, as it contains ingredients that support digestive health.

Novalac Novabean provides complete nutrition, containing lactose as the sole source of carbohydrates, along with magnesium and fiber to help improve bowel movement and relieve constipation. For infants over 6 months, Novalac Novabean complements nutritional requirements as part of a diversified diet, to be progressively introduced according to the advice of healthcare professionals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Novabean**:
â­ Always wash your hands before preparing the bottle.
â­ Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, nipple, and all used materials by boiling them for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil fresh water for minutes and let it cool down to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the feeding bottle first.
â­ Add the correct quantity of **Novalac Novabean** powder using the enclosed measuring spoon.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is totally dissolved.
â­ Let it cool to a lukewarm temperature of 37Â°C.
â­ Feed immediately. Each feeding should be consumed within one hour maximum after its preparation.

Cautions & Warnings:
â­ Do not use after the expiration date indicated under the tin (EXP).
â­ After opening, use within 3 weeks.
â­ Do not add sugar.
â­ Do not keep leftovers in the bottle; discard remaining infant formula quantities.
â­ Do not prepare the bottle in advance, but always just before feeding.
â­ Close the tin tightly after each use with the plastic lid.
â­ Store in a dry and cool place, away from light and contamination.
â­ Do not use the microwave to prepare or warm baby milk.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Novabean**:
â­ Lactose (sole source of carbohydrates).
â­ Magnesium (high content).
â­ Locust bean gum (source of fiber).
â­ Adapted ratio of whey/casein.

description_en:
Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus 400 Gm is a thickened formula specially designed to meet the nutritional needs of infants experiencing significant regurgitation and gastro-oesophageal reflux issues.

This milk features the unique PAXÂ® innovation, a blend of 3 natural thickeners: Pectin, Locust bean gum, and Tapioca starch. This combination works to thicken the milk rapidly and effectively, reducing regurgitation and regulating stool consistency. The PAXÂ® innovation combines the qualities of starch and dietary fibers to minimize regurgitation, with or without Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD), and its efficacy has been clinically proven through the SONAR study.

Furthermore, **Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus** is enriched with Docosahexaenoic Acid (DHA) and Arachidonic Acid (AA), essential fatty acids crucial for the development of a baby's brain and vision.

**Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus** can be used as the sole source of nutrition until the infant is 6 months old if breastfeeding is not possible. Beyond 6 months, **Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus** meets the nutritional requirements as part of a diversified diet, which should be gradually introduced according to the advice of your healthcare professional.

**Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus** is a comprehensive formula suitable for infants from birth up to one year of age.

**Important:** Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus should be taken under medical supervision.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus:
â­ Always wash your hands before preparing the bottle.
â­ Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, teat, and all used materials.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes, then let it cool to 40Â°C, or heat clean fresh bottled water with low mineral content to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Measure the correct quantity of powder into the feeding bottle using only the scoop provided in the tin. Always ensure scoops are leveled and the powder is not packed.
â­ Close the feeding bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Let the formula cool to lukewarm temperature (37Â°C), test the temperature by shaking a few drops onto the side of your wrist. Feed immediately.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of Novalac Baby Milk AR Plus:
â­ Key ingredients include the innovative PAXÂ® blend, comprising Pectin, Locust bean gum, and Tapioca starch.
â­ Contains essential fatty acids like DHA and AA.
â­ A complete formula to meet the needs of infants suffering from reflux.

title_en: Novalac Novabean Junior Baby Milk Powder (1+ Years) - 800 Gm
title_ar: Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ø¨ÙŠÙ† Ø¬ÙˆÙ†ÙŠÙˆØ± Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø¨ÙˆØ¯Ø±Ø© Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ ÙÙˆÙ‚ Ø³Ù†Ø© - 800 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Novalac Novabean Junior is a specialized milk formula for infants over one year old, designed to provide complete nutrition and assist in the dietary management of constipation. It contains lactose as the sole carbohydrate source, with a high magnesium content, locust bean gum (dietary fiber), and an adapted whey/casein ratio to ensure optimal growth and meet specific nutritional requirements.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Novabean Junior**:
â­ Always wash your hands before preparing the bottle.
â­ Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, nipple, and all used materials by boiling for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil fresh water and let it cool down to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the feeding bottle first.
â­ Add the correct quantity of **Novalac Novabean Junior** powder using the enclosed measuring scoop.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is totally dissolved.
â­ Let it cool to a lukewarm temperature (around 37Â°C).
â­ Feed immediately.
â­ Each feeding should be consumed within one hour maximum after preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Novabean Junior**:
â­ Lactose as the sole source of carbohydrates.
â­ High Magnesium content.
â­ Locust bean gum (fiber).
â­ Adapted ratio of whey/casein.
â­ Other nutritional ingredients for optimal growth.

#baby_formula #Novalac #Novabean #baby_nutrition #kids_health #infant_formula #breastfeeding #baby_essentials #SaudiArabia #SaudiMoms

description_en:
**Novalac Baby Milk (1)** is a standard infant formula specifically designed to feed healthy infants from birth to 6 months, when breastfeeding is not sufficient or possible. **Novalac Baby Milk (1)** is the ideal choice to ensure complete growth and optimal health for your baby, thanks to its ingredients that mimic breast milk. It is rich in essential nutrients that support the healthy development of your baby's brain and immune system.

â­ Ensures complete and optimal growth from birth to 6 months.
â­ Closely matches breast milk properties for maximum benefit.
â­ Fortified with iron and taurine to support brain development.
â­ Free from sucrose and gluten.
â­ Contains adequate protein content and an ideal balance of carbohydrates and fats.
â­ Provides a full range of essential vitamins and minerals.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Baby Milk (1)**:
â­ Always wash your hands before preparing the feed.
â­ Wash and sterilize all feeding equipment (bottle, nipple, etc.) by boiling for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil fresh drinking water and let it cool to a suitable temperature (around 40Â°C).
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the sterilized bottle first.
â­ Use the enclosed measuring spoon to add the correct quantity of **Novalac Baby Milk (1)** powder.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Let the milk cool to lukewarm temperature (around 37Â°C) before feeding your baby.
â­ Ensure the tin is tightly closed after each use and store it in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Baby Milk (1)**:
â­ Adequate protein quantity.
â­ Balanced carbohydrates and fats.
â­ Enriched with essential fatty acids for development support.
â­ A complete range of essential vitamins and minerals.
â­ Iron-fortified with added taurine for brain development.
â­ Sucrose-free.
â­ Gluten-free.

#Novalac #BabyMilk #Breastfeeding #InfantNutrition #SaudiBabies #BabyHealth #Newborn #FormulaMilk #BabyCare #SaudiArabia

title_en: Novalac AR: Specialty Infant Formula for Reflux, 400 Gm
title_ar: Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø¥ÙŠÙ‡ Ø¢Ø±: Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø¶Ø¹ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø®ØµØµ Ù„Ù…Ù‚Ø§ÙˆÙ…Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø±ØªØ¬Ø§Ø¹ØŒ 400 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Say goodbye to reflux troubles with **Novalac AR**, the perfect nutritional formula for your infant from birth to 12 months. **Novalac AR** is developed with a unique pre-thickened formula using specially treated corn starch to thicken in the baby's stomach, effectively reducing regurgitation, vomiting, and acid reflux. It also enhances gastric emptying and ensures normal absorption of essential minerals for healthy growth. Enriched with Long-Chain Polyunsaturated Fatty Acids (LC-PUFAs), **Novalac AR** supports optimal brain, vision, and immune development for your baby. 

â­ Pre-thickened with corn starch to reduce regurgitation and vomiting.
â­ Easy to feed from the bottle due to its thickened consistency.
â­ Promotes healthy gastric emptying.
â­ Ensures normal mineral absorption.
â­ Rich in LC-PUFAs to support brain, vision, and immune development.
â­ Nutritionally complete formula suitable from birth to 12 months.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac AR**:
â­ Always wash your hands and work surface thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, teat, and all used materials.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool down to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Measure the correct quantity of **Novalac AR** powder using the provided scoop, ensuring it is leveled and not packed.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Let the formula cool to lukewarm temperature (37Â°C) and test the temperature.
â­ Feed immediately.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac AR**:
â­ Treated Corn Starch.
â­ Long-Chain Polyunsaturated Fatty Acids (LC-PUFAs).
â­ Essential vitamins and minerals for comprehensive growth.
â­ Nutritionally complete formula.

#BabyFormula #Novalac #NovalacAR #InfantCare #BabyHealth #RefluxBaby #SpecialtyFormula #BabyNutrition #SaudiBaby #BabyEssentials

title_en: Novalac Aminova Hypoallergenic Infant Formula 400g
title_ar: Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø£Ù…ÙŠÙ†ÙˆÙØ§ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ù„Ù„ØªØ­Ø³Ø³ Ø§Ù„Ø´Ø¯ÙŠØ¯ 400 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Novalac Aminova is a specialized hypoallergenic infant formula meticulously crafted with free amino acids. It is entirely free from cow's milk protein, designed to meet the specific nutritional needs of infants and children suffering from severe cow's milk protein allergy. Featuring a unique blend with Pectin fibers, **Novalac Aminova** effectively helps manage severe gastroesophageal reflux associated with allergies. This formula is suitable from birth up to 12 months, providing complete and safe nutrition for your baby.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Aminova**:
â­ Always wash your hands thoroughly before preparing the bottle.
â­ Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, nipple, and all used materials by boiling them for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil fresh water and let it cool down to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the feeding bottle first.
â­ Add the correct quantity of **Novalac Aminova** powder using the enclosed measuring spoon.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Allow it to cool to lukewarm temperature (37Â°C). Test the temperature on the inner side of your wrist.
â­ Feed immediately. Each feeding should be consumed within a maximum of one hour after preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Aminova**:
â­ Free Amino Acid Blend.
â­ Pectin Fibers.
â­ Essential Vitamins and Minerals.
â­ Free from Cow's Milk Protein.
â­ Suitable for infants and children with severe allergies and multiple food allergies.

title_en: Novalac Baby Milk (1) 400 gm - Optimal Nutrition for Healthy Growth
title_ar: Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ (1) 400 Ø¬Ù… - ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù†Ù…Ùˆ ØµØ­ÙŠ
description_en:
Novalac 1 is the standard infant formula, perfectly adapted for feeding healthy infants from birth to 6 months when breastfeeding is not possible or insufficient. **Novalac Baby Milk (1) 400 gm** closely matches the nutritional profile of breast milk, ensuring your baby's optimal growth and development from birth. It's the ideal choice to meet your baby's nutritional needs during the crucial first months.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Baby Milk (1) 400 gm**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing the feed.
â­ Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, nipple, and all utensils by boiling them for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool to approximately 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the sterilized feeding bottle.
â­ Use only the measuring spoon provided in the tin to add the recommended quantity of **Novalac Baby Milk (1) 400 gm** powder.
â­ Close the bottle tightly and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Let the milk cool to body temperature (around 37Â°C) before feeding your baby.
â­ Discard any leftover milk after one hour of preparation.
â­ Do not warm feeds in a microwave.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Baby Milk (1) 400 gm**:
â­ Adequate and appropriate protein content for infants.
â­ Balanced carbohydrate and fat content for optimal growth.
â­ Enriched with essential fatty acids crucial for brain development.
â­ A complete range of essential vitamins and minerals.
â­ Iron-fortified with added Taurine for enhanced brain development.
â­ Sucrose-free to reduce the risk of cavities.
â­ Gluten-free for easy digestion.

title_en: Novalac Genio Plus Vanilla - Growing-up Milk for Children 3+ Years (800 Gm)
title_ar: Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø¬ÙŠÙ†ÙŠÙˆ Ø¨Ù„Ø³ Ø¨Ø§Ù„ÙØ§Ù†ÙŠÙ„ÙŠØ§ - Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ù†Ù…Ùˆ Ù„Ù„Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ 3 Ø³Ù†ÙˆØ§Øª ÙÙ…Ø§ ÙÙˆÙ‚ (800 Ø¬Ù…)
description_en:
Unlock your child's full growth potential with **Novalac Genio Plus Vanilla**, the ideal milk for children aged 3 years and above. Specially formulated to support your child's physical and mental development during this crucial stage, it offers a unique blend of essential vitamins and minerals that may be difficult to obtain from a regular diet. **Novalac Genio Plus Vanilla** is rich in vital nutrients like Omega 3 & 6 for brain development, Vitamin D for healthy bone growth, and Iron to support cognitive function and prevent anemia. Make your child's growth complete and effortless with this innovative milk.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Genio Plus Vanilla**:
â­ Always wash your hands thoroughly before preparing the milk.
â­ Wash and sterilize all utensils (cup and spoon) by boiling them for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil clean drinking water and let it cool to a suitable temperature.
â­ Use only the enclosed scoop and level off any excess powder using the inner edge of the tin.
â­ Add the required number of scoops of powder as per the feeding chart into the cup.
â­ Shake or stir the cup well until the milk is completely dissolved.
â­ Close the tin tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Genio Plus Vanilla**:
â­ Contains Omega 3 & Omega 6, essential elements for your child's brain development.
â­ Enriched with Vitamin D, crucial for normal bone growth.
â­ Provides Iron, a vital nutrient for cognitive development and anemia prevention.
â­ A balanced mix of vitamins and minerals to support holistic growth.

description_en:
**Novalac Genio**: Specially formulated for toddlers from 1 to 3 years of age, **Novalac Genio** serves as a healthy alternative to regular cow's milk, which may not be adapted to your child's specific nutritional needs after Novalac follow-on formula. **Novalac Genio** is sucrose-free and features a delicious vanilla taste, providing an ideal balance of essential nutrients for your child's growth.

â­ Supports your child's physical and mental development with iron fortification (25 times more than cow's milk).
â­ Calcium and Vitamin D contribute to building strong and healthy bones, teeth, and muscles.
â­ Contains 24 essential vitamins and minerals for overall child health.
â­ A balanced blend of proteins, essential fatty acids, and easily digestible carbohydrates.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Genio**:
â­ Always wash your hands before preparing your baby's bottle.
â­ Clean and sterilize all feeding utensils (bottle, nipple, scoop) by boiling for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil clean drinking water and let it cool to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the feeding bottle.
â­ Add the recommended number of scoops of **Novalac Genio** powder using the enclosed measuring scoop.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Allow the milk to cool to 37Â°C before feeding.
â­ Each feeding should be consumed within one hour of preparation.
â­ Keep the tin tightly closed in a cool, dry place away from light and moisture.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Genio**:
â­ Fortified with iron to promote physical development.
â­ Fortified with calcium and vitamin D for healthy bones and teeth.
â­ Contains 24 essential vitamins and minerals.
â­ A balanced mix of proteins, fatty acids, and carbohydrates.

#Novalac #Genio #BabyMilk #ToddlerNutrition #ChildHealth #KidGrowth #PowderMilk #SaudiArabia #Riyadh #Jeddah

title_ar: Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ø¨ÙŠÙ† Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ Ù„Ù„Ø¥Ù…Ø³Ø§Ùƒ 400 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Novalac Novabean is a complete infant formula specifically designed to support infant growth and meet their nutritional needs, with a focus on aiding constipation. **Novalac Novabean** is a complete nutritional option that may be recommended by healthcare professionals. **Novalac Novabean** provides lactose as the sole source of carbohydrates, along with magnesium and fiber to aid digestion.

â­ Complete formula for infants from birth to 12 months.
â­ Helps relieve constipation in infants.
â­ Contains lactose as the sole carbohydrate source.
â­ Enriched with magnesium and locust bean gum (fiber) for digestive support.
â­ Supports optimal infant growth.
â­ Suitable as part of a diversified diet for infants over 6 months.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Novabean**
â­ Always wash your hands before preparing the bottle.
â­ Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, nipple, and all utensils by boiling for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil fresh water and let it cool down to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the feeding bottle first.
â­ Add the correct quantity of **Novalac Novabean** powder using the enclosed measuring spoon.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Let it cool to a lukewarm temperature of 37Â°C.
â­ Feed immediately. Each feeding should be consumed within one hour maximum after preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Novabean**
â­ Lactose (sole source of carbohydrates).
â­ Magnesium.
â­ Locust bean gum (fiber).
â­ Adapted ratio of whey/casein.

description_en:
**Novalac Colinova** is a specially designed formula for babies experiencing diarrhea, offering a lactose-free composition to protect your baby from dehydration. It compensates for energy loss with rapidly absorbed sugars and rehydrates instantly due to its high electrolyte concentration. It also stimulates your baby's appetite, is easily digestible, but intended for short-term feeding. After diarrhea improves, your baby can be gradually introduced to other Novalac formulas. It has a pleasant taste, is lactose-free, and is suitable from birth to 3 years old.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Colinova**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing your baby's feed.
â­ Wash and sterilize all utensils (cup and spoon).
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and then let it cool to a suitable temperature.
â­ Use only the enclosed scoop and add the required number of scoops according to the feeding chart.
â­ Mix or shake until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Close the can tightly after each use and store it in a cool, dry place.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Colinova**:
â­ Lactose-free formulation.
â­ Rapidly absorbed sugars to compensate for energy loss.
â­ High concentration of electrolytes for immediate rehydration.
â­ Contains banana and apple puree to stimulate appetite.

#BabyMilk #Novalac #BabyHealth #InfantCare #LowLactoseMilk #Babies #Riyadh #Jeddah #SaudiArabia #Moms

title_ar: Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø£Ø·ÙØ§Ù„ (2) 400 Ø¬Ù… - ØªØºØ°ÙŠØ© Ù…Ø«Ø§Ù„ÙŠØ© Ù„Ù†Ù…Ùˆ ØµØ­ÙŠ
description_en:
Novalac Baby Milk (2) 400 gm is the specially formulated infant milk intended for healthy infants from 6 to 12 months of age when breastfeeding is not applied. Its unique composition closely matches the nutritional profile of breast milk, ensuring optimal growth and development as part of a diversified diet.

â­ Adequate and appropriate protein content
â­ Balanced carbohydrates and fats
â­ Rich in essential fatty acids
â­ Complete range of vitamins and minerals
â­ Iron-fortified with taurine for better brain development
â­ Sucrose-free
â­ Gluten-free

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Baby Milk (2)**:
â­ Always wash your hands before preparing the feed.
â­ Wash and sterilize all feeding utensils (bottle, nipple, etc.) by boiling for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool down to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the sterilized feeding bottle.
â­ Add the correct quantity of **Novalac Baby Milk (2)** powder using the enclosed measuring spoon.
â­ Close the bottle tightly and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Let it cool to body temperature (approx. 37Â°C) and test the temperature by placing a drop on your wrist.
â­ The prepared feed must be consumed within one hour.
â­ Discard any remaining milk in the bottle.
â­ Do not heat feeds in the microwave.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Baby Milk (2)**:
â­ Protein sources from Cow's milk.
â­ Essential vitamins and minerals for infant development.
â­ Essential fatty acids for healthy development.
â­ Added iron to support cognitive growth.
â­ Gluten-free.
â­ Sucrose-free.

#Novalac #BabyMilk #InfantNutrition #HealthyGrowth #6MonthsPlus #FormulaMilk #BabyCare #ChildHealth #Breastfeeding #SaudiArabia

title_ar: Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø®Ø§Ù„ÙŠ Ù…Ù† Ø§Ù„Ù„Ø§ÙƒØªÙˆØ² Ø¯ÙŠØ§Ø±ÙŠÙ†ÙˆÙØ§ 600 Ø¬Ù… Ù„Ø¹Ù„Ø§Ø¬ Ø§Ù„Ø¥Ø³Ù‡Ø§Ù„ Ù„Ø¯Ù‰ Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø¶Ø¹
description_en:
Novalac Lactose-Free Diarinova 600g is a specialized medical formula designed to support the nutrition of infants and children during and after episodes of diarrhea. This formula helps replenish lost fluids and electrolytes, and contains easily absorbed monosaccharides to improve energy levels. It is lactose-free and gluten-free, making it gentle on sensitive stomachs. It can be used from birth up to three years of age, offering a pleasant taste and ideal stool consistency.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Lactose-Free Diarinova 600g**:
â­ Always wash your hands before preparing the bottle.
â­ Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, nipple, and all used materials by boiling them for 10 minutes.
â­ Boil fresh water and let it cool down to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the feeding bottle first.
â­ Add the correct quantity of **Novalac Lactose-Free Diarinova 600g** powder using the measuring spoon enclosed in the tin.
â­ Close the bottle and shake well until the powder is totally dissolved.
â­ Let it cool to a lukewarm temperature of 37Â°C â€“ test the temperature on the inner side of your wrist.
â­ Feed immediately. Each feeding should be consumed within one hour maximum after its preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Lactose-Free Diarinova 600g**:
â­ Lactose-free formulation.
â­ Concentrated electrolytes and minerals for improved hydration.
â­ Monosaccharides (glucose and fructose) for easy absorption.
â­ Gluten-free.
â­ Enriched with natural fruit flavors (banana and apple extract).
â­ Designed for short-term feeding during diarrhea.

title_ar: Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ Ø¬ÙŠÙ†ÙŠÙˆ Ø­Ù„ÙŠØ¨ Ø§Ù„Ù†Ù…Ùˆ (3) Ø¹Ø¨ÙˆØ© 2 * 800 Ø¬Ù…
description_en:
Introducing **Novalac Genio Growth Milk (3)**, the perfect solution for your toddler's nutrition from 1 to 3 years. Specially formulated as an alternative to cow's milk, **Novalac Genio Growth Milk (3)** meets the growing nutritional needs of your child with a unique, sucrose-free vanilla flavor to protect their teeth. **Novalac Genio Growth Milk (3)** is enriched with a balanced blend of 24 essential vitamins and minerals, including Calcium, Vitamin D, and Iron, along with the ideal amount of proteins and essential fatty acids for healthy development.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac Genio Growth Milk (3)**:
â­ Always wash your hands thoroughly before preparing the bottle.
â­ Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, nipple, and all used materials by boiling them in water for 5 minutes.
â­ Boil fresh drinking water and let it cool down to 40Â°C.
â­ Pour the required amount of water into the sterilized feeding bottle.
â­ Use the enclosed measuring spoon to measure the correct quantity of **Novalac Genio Growth Milk (3)** powder, ensuring the spoon is leveled and not packed.
â­ Close the bottle tightly and shake well until the powder is completely dissolved.
â­ Allow the milk to cool to lukewarm temperature (around 37Â°C).
â­ Feed your baby immediately. Each feeding should be consumed within one hour maximum after preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac Genio Growth Milk (3)**:
â­ Contains a balanced mix of 24 vitamins and minerals.
â­ Enriched with Calcium and Vitamin D for bone health.
â­ Provides adequate Iron for healthy growth.
â­ Contains proteins and essential fatty acids.
â­ Sucrose-free.
â­ Natural vanilla flavor.

title_ar: Ù†ÙˆÙØ§Ù„Ø§Ùƒ (2) 800 Ø¬Ù…: ØªØ±ÙƒÙŠØ¨Ø© Ù…ØªØ§Ø¨Ø¹Ø© Ù…ØªÙƒØ§Ù…Ù„Ø©
description_en:
Novalac (2) 800 Gm is a family pack offering an ideal follow-on formula for your baby's growth from 6 months onwards. Its balanced composition ensures your infant receives essential nutrients to support healthy development. Discover the economical choice for parents seeking superior quality and abundant quantity.

â­ Specially formulated to meet the nutritional needs of infants aged 6 months and above.
â­ Enriched with essential vitamins and minerals to support physical and cognitive growth.
â­ Contains prebiotics to promote digestive health.
â­ Comes in an easy-to-dissolve powder form for parental convenience.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Novalac (2) 800 Gm**:
â­ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparation.
â­ Sterilize all feeding equipment.
â­ Use cooled boiled water or bottled water as instructed.
â­ Follow the feeding schedule provided on the package.
â­ Mix the powder with water in the specified proportions.
â­ Do not reuse leftover milk.
â­ Discard any unused formula after one hour of preparation.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Novalac (2) 800 Gm**:
â­ Demineralized Whey
â­ Lactose
â­ Various Vegetable Oils (e.g., palm oil, coconut oil)
â­ A complete range of Vitamins and Minerals (like Iron, Calcium, Vitamin D)
â­ Prebiotics to support digestion (e.g., FOS, GOS)
â­ May contain additional ingredients for complete nutrition.

description_en:
Experience exceptional value with the **Nunu Promo Pack Shampoo 800ml + Bath 500ml**. This carefully curated pack ensures your little one's delicate skin and hair are treated with the utmost care. Our Nunu Tear-Free Baby Shampoo features an exclusive mild formula, perfect for maintaining a healthy feel for delicate hair and scalp. Complement this with Nunu Baby Bath, designed to be gentle and nurturing for your baby's skin, making bath time a soothing experience. This promo pack is your go-to for comprehensive and gentle baby care.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Nunu Promo Pack Shampoo 800ml + Bath 500ml**:
â­ Shampoo: Wet your baby's hair, pour a small amount of **Nunu Promo Pack Shampoo 800ml + Bath 500ml** onto your hand, lather gently into hair, and rinse thoroughly.
â­ Baby Bath: Pour a little baby bath onto your hand, lather, and gently apply directly to your baby's skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Nunu Promo Pack Shampoo 800ml + Bath 500ml**:
â­ Aqua, Betain, Coco Glucoside, Sorbitol, Coconut Diethanolamide, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum.

title_ar: Ù†ÙŠÙˆØªØ±ÙˆØ¬ÙŠÙ†Ø§ Ù‡ÙŠØ¯Ø±Ùˆ Ø¨ÙˆØ³Øª Ø¬Ù„ Ù…Ø§Ø¦ÙŠ Ù…Ø±Ø·Ø¨ Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø§Ø¯ÙŠØ© Ø¥Ù„Ù‰ Ø§Ù„Ù…Ø®ØªÙ„Ø·Ø© 50 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Don't just moisturize, hydrate! Quench your skin's thirst with **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel**.

This award-winning, best-selling water gel instantly revitalizes dry skin, leaving it looking smooth, supple, and so hydrated, it bounces back. Its unique formula absorbs quickly to deliver intense hydration that lasts, keeping your skin refreshed and replenished all day long. **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel** is perfect for normal to combination skin, enriched with hyaluronic acid to boost hydration and lock it in. Glycerin and olive extract work to strengthen the skin's moisture barrier, preventing excessive moisture loss. It's oil-free, non-comedogenic (won't clog pores), and suitable for sensitive skin, with dermatologist-tested assurance for a healthy, radiant look.

â­ Intensely hydrating and instantly refreshing
â­ Lightweight, oil-free formula
â­ 100% alcohol-free
â­ Non-comedogenic (wonâ€™t clog pores)
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin
â­ Dermatologist tested
â­ Enhances skin suppleness and smoothness

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel**:
â­ Apply daily to cleansed face and neck using gentle, circular motions.
â­ For optimal results, try using it with the Hydro Boost Gel Cream to help lock in hydration.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel**:
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Acts like a sponge, absorbing and retaining water in the skin.
â­ Glycerin & Olive Extract: Strengthen the moisture barrier and prevent water loss.
â­ Oil-free and non-comedogenic formula.

description_en:
Achieve a clear, flawless complexion with **Neutrogena Spot Controlling Facial Wash**. Our innovative, oil-free formula, clinically proven with Salicylic Acid, is specifically designed to combat stubborn spots and help prevent future breakouts, revealing radiant skin. This facial wash deeply cleanses to help clear spots while respecting your skin's natural barrier, leaving it clean and refreshed.

â­ Clinically proven formula to tackle stubborn spots.
â­ Deeply cleanses the skin for a refined complexion.
â­ Helps defend against future breakouts.
â­ Oil-free formula, perfect for spot-prone skin.
â­ Dermatologist tested for efficacy and safety.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Spot Controlling Facial Wash**:
â­ Use twice daily for optimal results.
â­ Wet your face thoroughly.
â­ Apply a small amount to your hands and add a little water.
â­ Gently massage your face in circular motions.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water to remove all traces of the wash.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Spot Controlling Facial Wash**:
â­ Salicylic Acid: To treat acne and cleanse pores.
â­ Glycerin: To moisturize the skin and maintain its softness.
â­ Panthenol: To soothe the skin and promote renewal.
â­ Gentle formula, free from harmful ingredients.

#Neutrogena #FacialWash #Skincare #HealthySkin #AcneTreatment #SpotControl #ClearSkin #OilySkin #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Quench your skin's thirst and reveal a healthy, radiant complexion with **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gel Cream For Dry Skin**. This lightweight gel-cream absorbs quickly, delivering intense, long-lasting hydration to dry skin. Formulated with hyaluronic acid, **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gel Cream For Dry Skin** acts like a sponge, drawing moisture into the skin for a smooth, supple, and revitalized feel. Perfect for dry and sensitive skin, it's non-comedogenic, oil-free, and alcohol-free.

â­ Delivers intense hydration for smooth and supple skin.
â­ Provides lasting freshness and vitality throughout the day.
â­ Enriched with hyaluronic acid for superior moisture.
â­ Lightweight and fast-absorbing formula.
â­ Oil-free, alcohol-free, and non-comedogenic.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin and dermatologist-tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gel Cream For Dry Skin**
â­ Apply daily to cleansed face and neck.
â­ Gently massage in circular motions for complete absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gel Cream For Dry Skin**
â­ Hyaluronic Acid
â­ Glycerin
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Other moisturizing agents.

#Neutrogena #HydroBoost #GelCream #SkinHydration #Skincare #DrySkin #BeautyProducts #DeepHydration #SkinRadiance #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover clarity and radiance with **Neutrogena Fresh & Clear Facial Wash**, an invigorating, oil-free daily facial gel cleanser with natural exfoliators for a clearer, brighter complexion. Infused with pink grapefruit & Vitamin C, **Neutrogena Fresh & Clear Facial Wash** gently cleanses and purifies your skin to help prevent imperfections without over-drying, revealing a healthy-looking and clear complexion.

â­ Invigorating, oil-free daily facial wash.
â­ Contains natural exfoliators for a clearer complexion.
â­ Enriched with pink grapefruit and Vitamin C for enhanced radiance.
â­ Gently cleanses and purifies skin without over-drying.
â­ Helps prevent imperfections for healthy-looking skin.
â­ Ideal for blemish-prone skin.
â­ Dermatologist tested.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Fresh & Clear Facial Wash**:
â­ Use morning and evening.
â­ Gently massage onto a wet face.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

description_en:
Experience unparalleled freshness and clarity with **Neutrogena Deep Clean Gel Facial Wash**. This unique formula penetrates deep into your pores, effectively dissolving dirt, excess oil, and makeup traces that can dull your complexion. Its gentle yet powerful action instantly improves your skin's look and feel without over-drying, leaving it smooth, radiant, and healthy-looking.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Neutrogena Deep Clean Gel Facial Wash**:
â­ Use daily on a wet face.
â­ Gently massage in circular motions.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Neutrogena Deep Clean Gel Facial Wash**:
â­ Effectively removes dirt, excess oil, and impurities.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
â­ Dermatologist tested.
â­ Provides instant radiance and smoothness.

#Neutrogena #FacialWash #DeepClean #SkinCare #HealthySkin #SkinBrightening #DeepCleansing #BeautyProducts #SkinMoisture #SaudiArabia
